MiraiCP api document
src/single_include/MiraiCP/MiraiCP.hpp
浏览该文件的文档.

33#pragma clang diagnostic push
34#pragma ide diagnostic ignored "bugprone-macro-parentheses"
35#ifndef MIRAICP_PRO_MIRAICPMACROS_H
36#define MIRAICP_PRO_MIRAICPMACROS_H
37// This file contains static assertions and macros.
38// If any macro is used, one should always include this file directly or indirectly.
39// Dev: any new macro(s) should be added here since we have to ensure the "single" target
40// behaves just the same as "multi". If any macro infected the pre-compilation in "single",
41// we will know immediately in "multi".
42static_assert(sizeof(void *) == 8, "Only 64-bit platforms are supported");
43static_assert(sizeof(char) == 1, "Please make sure the size of char is 1");
44// detect platform, pre-define default value
45#define MIRAICP_WINDOWS 0
46#define MIRAICP_LINUX 0
47#define MIRAICP_UNIX 0
48#define MIRAICP_IOS 0
49#define MIRAICP_MACOS 0
50#define MIRAICP_ANDROID 0
51#define MIRAICP_TERMUX 0
52// detect platform
53// ref: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/5919996/how-to-detect-reliably-mac-os-x-ios-linux-windows-in-c-preprocessor
54#if defined(WIN32) || defined(_WIN32) || defined(__WIN32__) || defined(__NT__)
55#undef MIRAICP_WINDOWS
56#define MIRAICP_WINDOWS 1
57#elif __APPLE__
58#include <TargetConditionals.h>
59#if TARGET_IPHONE_SIMULATOR || TARGET_OS_MACCATALYST || TARGET_OS_IPHONE
60#undef MIRAICP_IOS
61#define MIRAICP_IOS 1
62#elif TARGET_OS_MAC
63#undef MIRAICP_MACOS
64#define MIRAICP_MACOS 1
65#else
66static_assert(false, "Unknown apple platform");
67#endif
68#elif __ANDROID__
69#ifdef __TERMUX__
70#undef MIRAICP_TERMUX
71#define MIRAICP_TERMUX 1
72#else
73#undef MIRAICP_ANDROID
74#define MIRAICP_ANDROID 1
75#endif
76#elif __linux__
77#undef MIRAICP_LINUX
78#define MIRAICP_LINUX 1
79#elif __unix__
80#undef MIRAICP_UNIX
81#define MIRAICP_UNIX 1
82#else
83static_assert(false, "Unsupported platform");
84#endif
85// compiler
86#define MIRAICP_MSVC 0
87#define MIRAICP_CLANG 0
88#define MIRAICP_GCC 0
89#define MIRAICP_COMPILER_OTHER 0
90#if defined(_MSC_VER) // MSVC
91#undef MIRAICP_MSVC
92#define MIRAICP_MSVC 1
93#elif defined(__clang__) // clang
94#undef MIRAICP_CLANG
95#define MIRAICP_CLANG 1
96#elif defined(__GNUC__) // GNUC, MinGW
97#undef MIRAICP_GCC
98#define MIRAICP_GCC 1
99#else
100#undef MIRAICP_COMPILER_OTHER
101#define MIRAICP_COMPILER_OTHER 1
102#endif
103// ShouldNotUse
104#if MIRAICP_MSVC
105#pragma warning(error : 4996)
106#define ShouldNotUse(msg) [[deprecated(msg)]]
107#elif MIRAICP_GCC
108#define ShouldNotUse(msg) [[deprecated(msg)]] __attribute__((error(msg)))
109#else
110#define ShouldNotUse(msg)
111#endif
112// assert
113#include <cassert>
114#ifndef assert
115#define assert(ignore) ((void) 0)
116#endif
117// exceptions
118#define MIRAICP_EXCEPTION_WHERE __FILE__, __LINE__
119#define MIRAICP_THROW(T, ...) throw T(__VA_ARGS__, MIRAICP_EXCEPTION_WHERE)
120// status codes
121#define PLUGIN_NORMAL 0
122#define PLUGIN_ERROR 1
123// noexcept statements block
124#define MIRAICP_CRITICAL_NOEXCEPT_BLOCK(statements) \
125 try { \
126 statements \
127 } catch (...) { return PLUGIN_ERROR; }
128// token paste and stringify
129#define TOKEN_PASTE_INNER(X, Y) X##Y
130#define TOKEN_PASTE(X, Y) TOKEN_PASTE_INNER(X, Y)
131#define STRINGIFY(A) __STRINGIFY(A)
132#ifndef __STRINGIFY
133#define __STRINGIFY(A) #A // NOLINT(bugprone-reserved-identifier)
134#endif
135// defer tool, works like the defer key word in Golang.
136#define MIRAICP_DEFER(code) \
137 auto TOKEN_PASTE(_defered_statement_wrapper_, __LINE__) = [&]() { code }; \
138 CommonTools::MiraiCPDefer TOKEN_PASTE(_defered_object_, __LINE__)(std::move(TOKEN_PASTE(_defered_statement_wrapper_, __LINE__)))
139#define MIRAICP_DEFER_LAMBDA(lambda) \
140 auto TOKEN_PASTE(_defered_statement_wrapper_, __LINE__) = lambda; \
141 CommonTools::MiraiCPDefer TOKEN_PASTE(_defered_object_, __LINE__)(std::move(TOKEN_PASTE(_defered_statement_wrapper_, __LINE__)))
142// names of plugin entry points
143#define FUNC_ENTRANCE FUNC_ENTRANCE
144#define FUNC_EVENT FUNC_EVENT
145#define FUNC_EXIT FUNC_EXIT
146#define PLUGIN_INFO PLUGIN_INFO
147// error handling
148#ifdef MIRAICP_LIB_SDK
149#define MIRAICP_ERROR_HANDLE(x, y) ErrorHandle0(__FILE__, __LINE__, (x), (y))
150#endif
151// export
152#define MIRAICP_EXPORT
153#if MIRAICP_WINDOWS
154#ifdef GOOGLE_TEST
155#undef MIRAICP_EXPORT
156#define MIRAICP_EXPORT __declspec(dllimport)
157#else
158#undef MIRAICP_EXPORT
159#define MIRAICP_EXPORT __declspec(dllexport)
160#endif
161#else
162#ifndef GOOGLE_TEST
163#undef MIRAICP_EXPORT
164#define MIRAICP_EXPORT __attribute__((visibility("default")))
165#endif
166#endif
167// data locker
168#define MIRAICP_DATALOCK std::shared_lock<std::shared_mutex> TOKEN_PASTE(local_lck_, __LINE__)(InternalData->getMutex())
169// getter
170// need to define macro LOC_CLASS_NAMESPACE to the class first!
171#define DECL_GETTER(attr) decltype(DataType::_##attr) attr();
172#define IMPL_GETTER(attr) \
173 decltype(LOC_CLASS_NAMESPACE::DataType::_##attr) LOC_CLASS_NAMESPACE::attr() { \
174 InternalData->requestRefresh(); \
175 MIRAICP_DATALOCK; \
176 return GetDataInternal()->_##attr; \
177 }
178#define INLINE_GETTER(attr) \
179 auto attr() { return GetDataInternal()->_##attr; }
180// api declarer
181#define DECL_API(x) decltype(&x) _##x
182// operator++ of iterable enum
183#define MIRAICP_ITERABLE_ENUM_OPERATOR_PLUSPLUS \
184 inline Type &operator++(Type &value) { \
185 value = (Type) ((int) value + 1); \
186 return value; \
187 } \
188 inline Type operator++(Type &value, int) { \
189 Type result = value; \
190 value = (Type) ((int) value + 1); \
191 return result; \
192 }
193// iterable enum
194#define MIRAICP_ITERABLE_ENUM(BeginAt, First, ...) \
195 enum Type : int { \
196 First = BeginAt, \
197 ##__VA_ARGS__, \
198 Count, \
199 Begin = BeginAt, \
200 End = Count, \
201 }; \
202 MIRAICP_ITERABLE_ENUM_OPERATOR_PLUSPLUS
203#endif //MIRAICP_PRO_MIRAICPMACROS_H
204#pragma clang diagnostic pop
205// Copyright (c) 2022. Eritque arcus and contributors.
206//
207// This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify
208// it under the terms of the GNU Affero General Public License as

215// GNU Affero General Public License for more details.

218// along with this program. If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.

306#define MIRAICP_COMPILER_OTHER 1
307#endif

311#define ShouldNotUse(msg) [[deprecated(msg)]]
312#elif MIRAICP_GCC
313#define ShouldNotUse(msg) [[deprecated(msg)]] __attribute__((error(msg)))
314#else
315#define ShouldNotUse(msg)
316#endif

320#define assert(ignore) ((void) 0)
321#endif

324#define MIRAICP_THROW(T, ...) throw T(__VA_ARGS__, MIRAICP_EXCEPTION_WHERE)

332 } catch (...) { return PLUGIN_ERROR; }

337#ifndef __STRINGIFY
338#define __STRINGIFY(A) #A // NOLINT(bugprone-reserved-identifier)
339#endif
340// defer tool, works like the defer key word in Golang.
341#define MIRAICP_DEFER(code) \
342 auto TOKEN_PASTE(_defered_statement_wrapper_, __LINE__) = [&]() { code }; \
343 CommonTools::MiraiCPDefer TOKEN_PASTE(_defered_object_, __LINE__)(std::move(TOKEN_PASTE(_defered_statement_wrapper_, __LINE__)))
344#define MIRAICP_DEFER_LAMBDA(lambda) \
345 auto TOKEN_PASTE(_defered_statement_wrapper_, __LINE__) = lambda; \
346 CommonTools::MiraiCPDefer TOKEN_PASTE(_defered_object_, __LINE__)(std::move(TOKEN_PASTE(_defered_statement_wrapper_, __LINE__)))
347// names of plugin entry points

361#define MIRAICP_EXPORT __declspec(dllimport)

364#define MIRAICP_EXPORT __declspec(dllexport)
365#endif
366#else
367#ifndef GOOGLE_TEST
368#undef MIRAICP_EXPORT
369#define MIRAICP_EXPORT __attribute__((visibility("default")))
370#endif
371#endif
372// data locker
373#define MIRAICP_DATALOCK std::shared_lock<std::shared_mutex> TOKEN_PASTE(local_lck_, __LINE__)(InternalData->getMutex())
374// getter
375// need to define macro LOC_CLASS_NAMESPACE to the class first!
376#define DECL_GETTER(attr) decltype(DataType::_##attr) attr();
377#define IMPL_GETTER(attr) \
378 decltype(LOC_CLASS_NAMESPACE::DataType::_##attr) LOC_CLASS_NAMESPACE::attr() { \
379 InternalData->requestRefresh(); \
380 MIRAICP_DATALOCK; \
381 return GetDataInternal()->_##attr; \
382 }
383#define INLINE_GETTER(attr) \
384 auto attr() { return GetDataInternal()->_##attr; }
385// api declarer
386#define DECL_API(x) decltype(&x) _##x
387// operator++ of iterable enum
388#define MIRAICP_ITERABLE_ENUM_OPERATOR_PLUSPLUS \
389 inline Type &operator++(Type &value) { \
390 value = (Type) ((int) value + 1); \
391 return value; \
392 } \
393 inline Type operator++(Type &value, int) { \
394 Type result = value; \
395 value = (Type) ((int) value + 1); \
396 return result; \
397 }
398// iterable enum
399#define MIRAICP_ITERABLE_ENUM(BeginAt, First, ...) \
400 enum Type : int { \
401 First = BeginAt, \
402 ##__VA_ARGS__, \
403 Count, \
404 Begin = BeginAt, \
405 End = Count, \
406 }; \
407 MIRAICP_ITERABLE_ENUM_OPERATOR_PLUSPLUS
408#endif //MIRAICP_PRO_MIRAICPMACROS_H
409#pragma clang diagnostic pop
410// -----------------------
411#include <cassert>
412#include <string>
413namespace MiraiCP {
414 // this class is used to ensure data consistency between dynamic libs
415 // note: DO NOT use this directly;
416 // always convert to const char* or std::string before using.
419 class MIRAICP_EXPORT MiraiCPString final {
420 using string = std::string;
421 private:
422 static constexpr decltype(&::std::free) std_free_ptr = &::std::free;
423 private:
424 // to keep integration and safe for empty construction/deconstruction, always initialize here
425 char *str = nullptr;
426 size_t _size = 0;
427 decltype(&::std::free) free_this = std_free_ptr; // specify which free() to use; ensure deconstruction is paired to construction
428 public:
429 [[nodiscard]] bool isEmpty() const {
430 return _size == 0;
431 }
432 MiraiCPString() = default;
433 // call if _size is set to non-zero
434 // allocate memory for str
435 void construction();
436 ~MiraiCPString();
437 MiraiCPString(const MiraiCPString &other);
438 MiraiCPString(MiraiCPString &&temp) noexcept;
439 MiraiCPString(const char *char_str); // NOLINT(google-explicit-constructor)
440 MiraiCPString(const std::string &string_str); // NOLINT(google-explicit-constructor)
441 [[nodiscard]] std::string toString() const {
442 if (str == nullptr || _size == 0) return {};
443 return {str};
444 }
445 operator std::string() const { // NOLINT(google-explicit-constructor)
446 return toString();
447 }
448 // for safe destruction, DO NOT provide move conversion to char*
449 // the return value of this method can always be deleted by delete[] and is never nullptr
450 [[nodiscard]] const char *copyToCharPtr() const;
451 bool operator==(const MiraiCPString &another) const;
452 MiraiCPString &operator=(const MiraiCPString &another);
453 MiraiCPString &operator=(MiraiCPString &&another) noexcept;
454 private:
455 void swap(MiraiCPString &other) noexcept;
456 };
457 static_assert(sizeof(char *) == 8, "Please make sure the size of pointers is 8 bytes");
458 static_assert(sizeof(MiraiCPString) == 3 * 8, "Please make sure the size of size_t is 8 bytes");
459} // namespace MiraiCP
460#endif //MIRAICP_PRO_MIRAICPSTRINGINTERNAL_H

464// it under the terms of the GNU Affero General Public License as
465// published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the
466// License, or any later version(in your opinion).

469// but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
470// MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the

472//
473// You should have received a copy of the GNU Affero General Public License
474// along with this program. If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
475//
476#ifndef MIRAICP_PRO_PLATFORMTHREADING_H
477#define MIRAICP_PRO_PLATFORMTHREADING_H
478// #include "MiraiCPMacros.h"
479// -----------------------
480#if MIRAICP_MSVC
481#include <Windows.h>
482#include <processthreadsapi.h>
483#include <string>
484inline void *platform_thread_self() {
485 return GetCurrentThread();
486}
487inline void platform_set_thread_name(void *platform_thread_self, const char *name) {
488 size_t len = strlen(name);
489 std::wstring wst(len + 1, '#');
490 size_t num_convert;
491 mbstowcs_s(&num_convert, &wst[0], len + 1, name, len + 1);
492 SetThreadDescription(platform_thread_self, &wst[0]);
493}
494inline void platform_get_thread_name(void *platform_thread_self, char *buf, size_t bufsize) {
495 wchar_t *wbuf;
496 GetThreadDescription(platform_thread_self, &wbuf);
497 size_t num_convert;
498 wcstombs_s(&num_convert, buf, bufsize, wbuf, bufsize);
499 LocalFree(wbuf);
500}
501#else
502#include <thread>
503inline auto platform_thread_self() {
504 return pthread_self();
505}
506inline void platform_set_thread_name(decltype(platform_thread_self()) id, const char *name) {
507 pthread_setname_np(id, name);
508}
509inline void platform_get_thread_name(decltype(platform_thread_self()) id, char *buf, size_t bufsize) {
510 pthread_getname_np(id, buf, bufsize);
511}
512#endif
513#endif //MIRAICP_PRO_PLATFORMTHREADING_H
514#ifndef MIRAICP_PRO_PLUGINCONFIG_H
515#define MIRAICP_PRO_PLUGINCONFIG_H
516// #include "MiraiCPStringInternal.h"
517// Copyright (c) 2022. Eritque arcus and contributors.
518//
519// This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify
520// it under the terms of the GNU Affero General Public License as
521// published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the
522// License, or any later version(in your opinion).
523//
524// This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
525// but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
526// MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the
527// GNU Affero General Public License for more details.
528//
529// You should have received a copy of the GNU Affero General Public License
530// along with this program. If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
531//
532#ifndef MIRAICP_PRO_MIRAICPSTRINGINTERNAL_H
533#define MIRAICP_PRO_MIRAICPSTRINGINTERNAL_H
534// #include "MiraiCPMacros.h"
535// -----------------------
536#include <cassert>
537#include <string>
538namespace MiraiCP {
539 // this class is used to ensure data consistency between dynamic libs
540 // note: DO NOT use this directly;
541 // always convert to const char* or std::string before using.
544 class MIRAICP_EXPORT MiraiCPString final {
545 using string = std::string;
546 private:
547 static constexpr decltype(&::std::free) std_free_ptr = &::std::free;
548 private:
549 // to keep integration and safe for empty construction/deconstruction, always initialize here
550 char *str = nullptr;
551 size_t _size = 0;
552 decltype(&::std::free) free_this = std_free_ptr; // specify which free() to use; ensure deconstruction is paired to construction
553 public:
554 [[nodiscard]] bool isEmpty() const {
555 return _size == 0;
556 }
557 MiraiCPString() = default;
558 // call if _size is set to non-zero
559 // allocate memory for str
560 void construction();
561 ~MiraiCPString();
562 MiraiCPString(const MiraiCPString &other);
563 MiraiCPString(MiraiCPString &&temp) noexcept;
564 MiraiCPString(const char *char_str); // NOLINT(google-explicit-constructor)
565 MiraiCPString(const std::string &string_str); // NOLINT(google-explicit-constructor)
566 [[nodiscard]] std::string toString() const {
567 if (str == nullptr || _size == 0) return {};
568 return {str};
569 }
570 operator std::string() const { // NOLINT(google-explicit-constructor)
571 return toString();
572 }
573 // for safe destruction, DO NOT provide move conversion to char*
574 // the return value of this method can always be deleted by delete[] and is never nullptr
575 [[nodiscard]] const char *copyToCharPtr() const;
576 bool operator==(const MiraiCPString &another) const;
577 MiraiCPString &operator=(const MiraiCPString &another);
578 MiraiCPString &operator=(MiraiCPString &&another) noexcept;
579 private:
580 void swap(MiraiCPString &other) noexcept;
581 };
582 static_assert(sizeof(char *) == 8, "Please make sure the size of pointers is 8 bytes");
583 static_assert(sizeof(MiraiCPString) == 3 * 8, "Please make sure the size of size_t is 8 bytes");
584} // namespace MiraiCP
585#endif //MIRAICP_PRO_MIRAICPSTRINGINTERNAL_H
586#include <json.hpp>
587namespace MiraiCP {
588 constexpr const char *m_MiraiCPVersion = "v2.13.0-alpha-3";
589 inline const std::string MiraiCPVersion = m_MiraiCPVersion;
590 struct PluginConfig {
592 const char *id = nullptr;
594 const char *name = nullptr;
596 const char *version = nullptr;
598 const char *author = nullptr;
600 const char *description = "";
602 const char *time = __DATE__;
603 const char *mversion = m_MiraiCPVersion;
604 std::string getId() const {
605 return {id};
606 }
607 std::string getName() const {
608 return {name};
609 }
610 std::string getVersion() const {
611 return {version};
612 }
613 std::string getAuthor() const {
614 return {author};
615 }
616 std::string getDescription() const {
617 return {description};
618 }
619 std::string getTime() const {
620 return {time};
621 }
622 std::string getMVersion() const {
623 return {mversion};
624 }
625 [[nodiscard]] bool isValid() const {
626 return id && name && version && author;
627 }
628 nlohmann::json serialize();
629 std::string serialize2string();
630 };
631} // namespace MiraiCP
632#endif //MIRAICP_PRO_PLUGINCONFIG_H
633// Copyright (c) 2022. Eritque arcus and contributors.
634//
635// This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify
636// it under the terms of the GNU Affero General Public License as
637// published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the
638// License, or any later version(in your opinion).
639//
640// This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
641// but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
642// MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the
643// GNU Affero General Public License for more details.
644//
645// You should have received a copy of the GNU Affero General Public License
646// along with this program. If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.

648#ifndef MIRAICP_PRO_COMMONTOOLS_H
649#define MIRAICP_PRO_COMMONTOOLS_H
650// #include "MiraiCPMacros.h"
651// -----------------------
652#include <functional>
653namespace CommonTools {
656 class MiraiCPDefer {
657 public:
658 std::function<void()> defer_func;
659 MiraiCPDefer(std::function<void()> func) : defer_func(std::move(func)) {
660 }
661 ~MiraiCPDefer() {
662 defer_func();
663 }
664 };
665} // namespace CommonTools
666#endif //MIRAICP_PRO_COMMONTOOLS_H
667// Copyright (c) 2022. Eritque arcus and contributors.
668//
669// This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify
670// it under the terms of the GNU Affero General Public License as
671// published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the
672// License, or any later version(in your opinion).
673//

675// but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
676// MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the
677// GNU Affero General Public License for more details.

680// along with this program. If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.

682#ifndef MIRAICP_PRO_COMMONTYPES_H
683#define MIRAICP_PRO_COMMONTYPES_H
684// don't create cpp for this header
685// #include "MiraiCPMacros.h"
686// -----------------------
687// #include "PluginConfig.h"
688#ifndef MIRAICP_PRO_PLUGINCONFIG_H
689#define MIRAICP_PRO_PLUGINCONFIG_H
690// #include "MiraiCPStringInternal.h"
691#include <json.hpp>
692namespace MiraiCP {
693 constexpr const char *m_MiraiCPVersion = "v2.13.0-alpha-3";
694 inline const std::string MiraiCPVersion = m_MiraiCPVersion;
695 struct PluginConfig {
697 const char *id = nullptr;
699 const char *name = nullptr;
701 const char *version = nullptr;
703 const char *author = nullptr;
705 const char *description = "";
707 const char *time = __DATE__;
708 const char *mversion = m_MiraiCPVersion;
709 std::string getId() const {
710 return {id};
711 }
712 std::string getName() const {
713 return {name};
714 }
715 std::string getVersion() const {
716 return {version};
717 }
718 std::string getAuthor() const {
719 return {author};
720 }
721 std::string getDescription() const {
722 return {description};
723 }
724 std::string getTime() const {
725 return {time};
726 }
727 std::string getMVersion() const {
728 return {mversion};
729 }
730 [[nodiscard]] bool isValid() const {
731 return id && name && version && author;
732 }
733 nlohmann::json serialize();
734 std::string serialize2string();
735 };
736} // namespace MiraiCP
737#endif //MIRAICP_PRO_PLUGINCONFIG_H
738// #include "loaderApiInternal.h"
739// Copyright (c) 2022. Eritque arcus and contributors.
740//
741// This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify
742// it under the terms of the GNU Affero General Public License as
743// published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the
744// License, or any later version(in your opinion).
745//
746// This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
747// but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
748// MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the
749// GNU Affero General Public License for more details.
750//
751// You should have received a copy of the GNU Affero General Public License
752// along with this program. If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
753//
754#ifndef MIRAICP_PRO_LOADERAPIINTERNAL_H
755#define MIRAICP_PRO_LOADERAPIINTERNAL_H
756// #include "MiraiCPStringInternal.h"
757#ifdef MIRAICP_LIB_LOADER
758constexpr size_t LOADERAPI_H_COUNTER_BASE = __COUNTER__ + 1;
759#define LOADERAPI_H_NOTHING(X)
760#define LOADERAPI_H_LOADER_API_INNER(X) LOADERAPI_H_NOTHING(X)
761#define LOADER_API_COUNT LOADERAPI_H_LOADER_API_INNER(__COUNTER__)
762#define LOADERAPI_H_GET_COUNTER (__COUNTER__ - LOADERAPI_H_COUNTER_BASE)
763#else
764#define LOADER_API_COUNT
765#endif
766// the API defs to be exposed
767namespace LibLoader::LoaderApi {
768 typedef void (*task_func)();
769 typedef void (*task_func_with_id)(size_t);
770 using MiraiCP::MiraiCPString;
771 LOADER_API_COUNT
772 MiraiCPString pluginOperation(const MiraiCPString &);
773 LOADER_API_COUNT
774 void loggerInterface(const MiraiCPString &content, const MiraiCPString &name, long long id, int level);
775 LOADER_API_COUNT
776 MiraiCPString showAllPluginId();
777 LOADER_API_COUNT
778 void pushTask(task_func);
779 LOADER_API_COUNT
780 void pushTaskWithId(task_func_with_id, size_t);
781 LOADER_API_COUNT
782 void timer(const MiraiCPString &, const MiraiCPString &, size_t);
783 // Admin api
784 LOADER_API_COUNT
785 void enablePluginById(const MiraiCPString &);
786 LOADER_API_COUNT
787 void disablePluginById(const MiraiCPString &);
788 LOADER_API_COUNT
789 void enableAllPlugins();
790 LOADER_API_COUNT
791 void disableAllPlugins();
792 LOADER_API_COUNT
793 void loadNewPlugin(const MiraiCPString &, bool);
794 LOADER_API_COUNT
795 void unloadPluginById(const MiraiCPString &);
796 LOADER_API_COUNT
797 void reloadPluginById(const MiraiCPString &);
798 // internal usage. do not call this directly in plugins.
799 struct interface_funcs {
800 static constexpr size_t line0 = __LINE__;
801 DECL_API(pluginOperation);
802 DECL_API(loggerInterface);
803 DECL_API(showAllPluginId);
804 DECL_API(pushTask);
805 DECL_API(pushTaskWithId);
806 DECL_API(timer);
807 static constexpr size_t line1 = __LINE__;
808 static constexpr size_t normal_api_count = line1 - line0 - 1;
809 // apis below can only be called by admin plugins
810 static constexpr size_t adminline0 = __LINE__;
811 DECL_API(enablePluginById) = nullptr;
812 DECL_API(disablePluginById) = nullptr;
813 DECL_API(enableAllPlugins) = nullptr;
814 DECL_API(disableAllPlugins) = nullptr;
815 DECL_API(loadNewPlugin) = nullptr;
816 DECL_API(unloadPluginById) = nullptr;
817 DECL_API(reloadPluginById) = nullptr;
818 static constexpr size_t adminline1 = __LINE__;
819 static constexpr size_t admin_api_count = adminline1 - adminline0 - 1;
820 static constexpr size_t api_count = normal_api_count + admin_api_count;
821 };
822#ifdef MIRAICP_LIB_LOADER
823 constexpr inline interface_funcs collect_interface_functions(bool admin) {
824 constexpr size_t counter = LOADERAPI_H_GET_COUNTER;
825 static_assert(interface_funcs::api_count == counter);
826 static_assert(sizeof(interface_funcs) == sizeof(void *) * counter); // also check pointer size
827 if (admin) {
828 constexpr size_t line0 = __LINE__;
829 interface_funcs t = {
830 pluginOperation,
831 loggerInterface,
832 showAllPluginId,
833 pushTask,
834 pushTaskWithId,
835 timer,
836 enablePluginById,
837 disablePluginById,
838 enableAllPlugins,
839 disableAllPlugins,
840 loadNewPlugin,
841 unloadPluginById,
842 reloadPluginById,
843 };
844 constexpr size_t line1 = __LINE__;
845 constexpr size_t allapi_construct_number = line1 - line0 - 3;
846 static_assert(allapi_construct_number == counter);
847 return t;
848 } else {
849 constexpr size_t line0 = __LINE__;
850 interface_funcs t2 = {
851 pluginOperation,
852 loggerInterface,
853 showAllPluginId,
854 pushTask,
855 pushTaskWithId,
856 timer,
857 }; // no admin functions
858 constexpr size_t line1 = __LINE__;
859 constexpr size_t adminapi_construct_number = line1 - line0 - 3;
860 static_assert(adminapi_construct_number == interface_funcs::normal_api_count);
861 return t2;
862 }
863 }
864#endif
865} // namespace LibLoader::LoaderApi
866#endif //MIRAICP_PRO_LOADERAPIINTERNAL_H
867namespace LibLoader {
868 typedef void *plugin_handle;
870 typedef int (*plugin_entrance_func_ptr)(const LoaderApi::interface_funcs &);
872 typedef int (*plugin_event_func_ptr)(const MiraiCP::MiraiCPString &);
874 typedef int (*plugin_func_ptr)();
876 typedef const MiraiCP::PluginConfig *(*plugin_info_func_ptr)();
877} // namespace LibLoader
878namespace MiraiCP {
879 using QQID = unsigned long long;
880} // namespace MiraiCP
881#endif //MIRAICP_PRO_COMMONTYPES_H
882// Copyright (c) 2022. Eritque arcus and contributors.
883//
884// This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify
885// it under the terms of the GNU Affero General Public License as
886// published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the
887// License, or any later version(in your opinion).
888//
889// This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
890// but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
891// MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the
892// GNU Affero General Public License for more details.
893//
894// You should have received a copy of the GNU Affero General Public License
895// along with this program. If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
896//
897#ifndef MIRAICP_PRO_LOADERAPIINTERNAL_H
898#define MIRAICP_PRO_LOADERAPIINTERNAL_H
899// #include "MiraiCPStringInternal.h"
900#ifdef MIRAICP_LIB_LOADER
901constexpr size_t LOADERAPI_H_COUNTER_BASE = __COUNTER__ + 1;
902#define LOADERAPI_H_NOTHING(X)
903#define LOADERAPI_H_LOADER_API_INNER(X) LOADERAPI_H_NOTHING(X)
904#define LOADER_API_COUNT LOADERAPI_H_LOADER_API_INNER(__COUNTER__)
905#define LOADERAPI_H_GET_COUNTER (__COUNTER__ - LOADERAPI_H_COUNTER_BASE)
906#else
907#define LOADER_API_COUNT
908#endif
909// the API defs to be exposed
910namespace LibLoader::LoaderApi {
911 typedef void (*task_func)();
912 typedef void (*task_func_with_id)(size_t);
913 using MiraiCP::MiraiCPString;
914 LOADER_API_COUNT
915 MiraiCPString pluginOperation(const MiraiCPString &);
916 LOADER_API_COUNT
917 void loggerInterface(const MiraiCPString &content, const MiraiCPString &name, long long id, int level);
918 LOADER_API_COUNT
919 MiraiCPString showAllPluginId();
920 LOADER_API_COUNT
921 void pushTask(task_func);
922 LOADER_API_COUNT
923 void pushTaskWithId(task_func_with_id, size_t);
924 LOADER_API_COUNT
925 void timer(const MiraiCPString &, const MiraiCPString &, size_t);
926 // Admin api
927 LOADER_API_COUNT
928 void enablePluginById(const MiraiCPString &);
929 LOADER_API_COUNT
930 void disablePluginById(const MiraiCPString &);
931 LOADER_API_COUNT
932 void enableAllPlugins();
933 LOADER_API_COUNT
934 void disableAllPlugins();
935 LOADER_API_COUNT
936 void loadNewPlugin(const MiraiCPString &, bool);
937 LOADER_API_COUNT
938 void unloadPluginById(const MiraiCPString &);
939 LOADER_API_COUNT
940 void reloadPluginById(const MiraiCPString &);
941 // internal usage. do not call this directly in plugins.
942 struct interface_funcs {
943 static constexpr size_t line0 = __LINE__;
944 DECL_API(pluginOperation);
945 DECL_API(loggerInterface);
946 DECL_API(showAllPluginId);
947 DECL_API(pushTask);
948 DECL_API(pushTaskWithId);
949 DECL_API(timer);
950 static constexpr size_t line1 = __LINE__;
951 static constexpr size_t normal_api_count = line1 - line0 - 1;
952 // apis below can only be called by admin plugins
953 static constexpr size_t adminline0 = __LINE__;
954 DECL_API(enablePluginById) = nullptr;
955 DECL_API(disablePluginById) = nullptr;
956 DECL_API(enableAllPlugins) = nullptr;
957 DECL_API(disableAllPlugins) = nullptr;
958 DECL_API(loadNewPlugin) = nullptr;
959 DECL_API(unloadPluginById) = nullptr;
960 DECL_API(reloadPluginById) = nullptr;
961 static constexpr size_t adminline1 = __LINE__;
962 static constexpr size_t admin_api_count = adminline1 - adminline0 - 1;
963 static constexpr size_t api_count = normal_api_count + admin_api_count;
964 };
965#ifdef MIRAICP_LIB_LOADER
966 constexpr inline interface_funcs collect_interface_functions(bool admin) {
967 constexpr size_t counter = LOADERAPI_H_GET_COUNTER;
968 static_assert(interface_funcs::api_count == counter);
969 static_assert(sizeof(interface_funcs) == sizeof(void *) * counter); // also check pointer size
970 if (admin) {
971 constexpr size_t line0 = __LINE__;
972 interface_funcs t = {
973 pluginOperation,
974 loggerInterface,
975 showAllPluginId,
976 pushTask,
977 pushTaskWithId,
978 timer,
979 enablePluginById,
980 disablePluginById,
981 enableAllPlugins,
982 disableAllPlugins,
983 loadNewPlugin,
984 unloadPluginById,
985 reloadPluginById,
986 };
987 constexpr size_t line1 = __LINE__;
988 constexpr size_t allapi_construct_number = line1 - line0 - 3;
989 static_assert(allapi_construct_number == counter);
990 return t;
991 } else {
992 constexpr size_t line0 = __LINE__;
993 interface_funcs t2 = {
994 pluginOperation,
995 loggerInterface,
996 showAllPluginId,
997 pushTask,
998 pushTaskWithId,
999 timer,
1000 }; // no admin functions
1001 constexpr size_t line1 = __LINE__;
1002 constexpr size_t adminapi_construct_number = line1 - line0 - 3;
1003 static_assert(adminapi_construct_number == interface_funcs::normal_api_count);
1004 return t2;
1005 }
1006 }
1007#endif
1008} // namespace LibLoader::LoaderApi
1009#endif //MIRAICP_PRO_LOADERAPIINTERNAL_H

1073#ifndef MIRAICP_PRO_IMIRAIDATA_H
1074#define MIRAICP_PRO_IMIRAIDATA_H
1075#include "json_fwd.hpp"
1076#include <atomic>
1077#include <shared_mutex>
1078namespace MiraiCP {
1080 struct IMiraiData {
1081 private:
1083 struct MiraiDataLocker final {
1085 std::shared_mutex _mtx;
1087 std::atomic<bool> _inited = false;
1088 };
1089 protected:
1091 mutable MiraiDataLocker Locker;
1092 public:
1093 IMiraiData() = default;
1094 virtual ~IMiraiData() = default;
1095 public:
1097 nlohmann::json toJson() const;
1098 protected:
1100 virtual void deserialize(nlohmann::json in_json) = 0;
1102 virtual nlohmann::json internalToJson() const = 0;
1107 nlohmann::json internalToString() const;
1108 public:
1110 void requestRefresh();
1116 void forceRefreshNextTime();
1118 std::string toString() const;
1120 std::shared_mutex &getMutex() {
1121 return Locker._mtx;
1122 }
1123 private:
1125 virtual void refreshInfo() = 0;
1126 };
1127} // namespace MiraiCP
1128#endif //MIRAICP_PRO_IMIRAIDATA_H
1129// #include "KtOperation.h"
1130// Copyright (c) 2020 - 2023. Eritque arcus and contributors.
1131//
1132// This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify
1133// it under the terms of the GNU Affero General Public License as
1134// published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the
1135// License, or any later version(in your opinion).
1136//
1137// This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
1138// but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
1139// MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the
1140// GNU Affero General Public License for more details.
1141//
1142// You should have received a copy of the GNU Affero General Public License
1143// along with this program. If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.

1145#ifndef MIRAICP_PRO_KTOPERATION_H
1146#define MIRAICP_PRO_KTOPERATION_H
1147#include <json_fwd.hpp>
1151namespace MiraiCP::KtOperation {
1153 enum operation_set {
1155 Recall,
1157 Send,
1159 RefreshInfo,
1161 UploadImg,
1163 QueryBotList,
1165 SendFile,
1167 RemoteFileInfo,
1169 QueryImgInfo,
1171 MuteM,
1173 QueryM,
1175 KickM,
1177 QueryOwner,
1179 Voice,
1181 GroupSetting,
1183 Buildforward,
1185 Nfroperation,
1187 Gioperation,
1189 SendWithQuote,
1191 Announcement,
1193 SendNudge,
1195 NextMsg,
1197 ModifyAdmin,
1199 MemberJoinRequest,
1201 ImageUploaded,
1203 CommandReg,
1205 ChangeNameCard,
1206 };
1207 enum QueryBotListCode {
1209 FriendList = 0, // 0
1211 GroupList, // 1
1213 MemberList, // 2
1214 };
1215 enum AnnouncementOperationCode {
1217 Delete = 1, // 1
1219 Publish, // 2
1220 };
1227 std::string ktOperation(
1228 operation_set type,
1229 const nlohmann::json &data,
1230 bool catchErr = true,
1231 const std::string &errorInfo = "");
1238 std::string ktOperationStr(
1239 operation_set type,
1240 const std::string &data,
1241 bool catchErr = true,
1242 const std::string &errorInfo = "");
1243} // namespace MiraiCP::KtOperation
1244#endif //MIRAICP_PRO_KTOPERATION_H
1245// #include "LowLevelAPI.h"
1246#ifndef MIRAICP_PRO_LOWLEVELAPI_H
1247#define MIRAICP_PRO_LOWLEVELAPI_H
1248#include <json_fwd.hpp>
1249namespace MiraiCP {
1251 class LowLevelAPI {
1252 public:
1256 static std::string getInfoSource(nlohmann::json c);
1263 static std::string uploadImg0(std::string, nlohmann::json);
1265 struct info {
1266 std::string nickOrNameCard;
1267 std::string avatarUrl;
1268 };
1271 static info info0(const std::string &source);
1272 };
1274 bool checkSafeCall();
1275} // namespace MiraiCP
1276#endif //MIRAICP_PRO_LOWLEVELAPI_H

1293#ifndef MIRAICP_PRO_MESSAGECHAIN_H
1294#define MIRAICP_PRO_MESSAGECHAIN_H
1295// #include "MiraiCPMacros.h"
1296// -----------------------
1297// #include "Exception.h"
1298#ifndef MIRAICP_PRO_EXCEPTION_H
1299#define MIRAICP_PRO_EXCEPTION_H
1300// #include "MiraiCPMacros.h"
1301// -----------------------
1302// #include "CPPPlugin.h"
1303#ifndef MIRAICP_PRO_CPPPLUGIN_H
1304#define MIRAICP_PRO_CPPPLUGIN_H
1305// #include "Logger.h"
1306#ifndef MIRAICP_PRO_LOGGER_H
1307#define MIRAICP_PRO_LOGGER_H
1308// #include "MiraiCode.h"
1309#ifndef MIRAICP_PRO_MIRAICODE_H
1310#define MIRAICP_PRO_MIRAICODE_H
1311#include <string>
1312namespace MiraiCP {
1314 class MiraiCodeable {
1315 public:
1317 virtual std::string toMiraiCode() const = 0;
1318 virtual ~MiraiCodeable() = default;
1319 };
1323 class MiraiCode : public MiraiCodeable {
1324 private:
1325 std::string content;
1326 public:
1327 ~MiraiCode() override = default;
1329 std::string toString();
1331 std::string toMiraiCode() const override {
1332 return content;
1333 }
1335 MiraiCode(MiraiCodeable *a) { // NOLINT(google-explicit-constructor)
1336 content = a->toMiraiCode();
1337 }
1340 MiraiCode(const std::string &a, bool convert = false);
1341 MiraiCode operator+(MiraiCodeable *a) {
1342 return {content + a->toMiraiCode()};
1343 }
1344 MiraiCode operator+(const std::string &a) {
1345 return {content + a};
1346 }
1347 MiraiCode operator+(const MiraiCode &a) {
1348 return {content + a.content};
1349 }
1350 MiraiCode operator+(MiraiCode *a) {
1351 return {content + a->content};
1352 }
1353 MiraiCode &operator=(const std::string &a) {
1354 this->content = a;
1355 return *this;
1356 }
1357 MiraiCode plus(MiraiCodeable *a) {
1358 return {content + a->toMiraiCode()};
1359 }
1360 MiraiCode plus(const std::string &a) {
1361 return MiraiCode(a) + this;
1362 }
1364 static MiraiCode MiraiCodeWithoutEscape(const std::string &a) {
1365 return {a, false};
1366 }
1368 static MiraiCode MiraiCodeWithoutEscape(MiraiCodeable *a) {
1369 return {a->toMiraiCode(), false};
1370 }
1371 };
1372} // namespace MiraiCP
1373#endif //MIRAICP_PRO_MIRAICODE_H
1374// #include "commonTypes.h"
1375// Copyright (c) 2022. Eritque arcus and contributors.
1376//
1377// This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify
1378// it under the terms of the GNU Affero General Public License as
1379// published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the
1380// License, or any later version(in your opinion).
1381//
1382// This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
1383// but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
1384// MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the
1385// GNU Affero General Public License for more details.
1386//
1387// You should have received a copy of the GNU Affero General Public License
1388// along with this program. If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.

1390#ifndef MIRAICP_PRO_COMMONTYPES_H
1391#define MIRAICP_PRO_COMMONTYPES_H
1392// don't create cpp for this header
1393// #include "MiraiCPMacros.h"
1394// -----------------------
1395// #include "PluginConfig.h"
1396// #include "loaderApiInternal.h"
1397namespace LibLoader {
1398 typedef void *plugin_handle;
1400 typedef int (*plugin_entrance_func_ptr)(const LoaderApi::interface_funcs &);
1402 typedef int (*plugin_event_func_ptr)(const MiraiCP::MiraiCPString &);
1404 typedef int (*plugin_func_ptr)();
1406 typedef const MiraiCP::PluginConfig *(*plugin_info_func_ptr)();
1407} // namespace LibLoader
1408namespace MiraiCP {
1409 using QQID = unsigned long long;
1410} // namespace MiraiCP
1411#endif //MIRAICP_PRO_COMMONTYPES_H
1412#include <functional>
1413#include <sstream>
1414namespace MiraiCP {
1415 class MiraiCodeable; // forward declaration
1427 class Logger_interface {
1428 using string = std::string;
1429 public:
1436 typedef std::function<void(string, int)> Action;
1438 struct Handler {
1440 bool enable = true;
1442 Action action;
1443 };
1444 std::shared_ptr<Handler> loggerhandler;
1445 private:
1446 static std::string constructString() {
1447 return "";
1448 }
1449 template<class T, class... T1>
1450 static std::string constructString(T &&val, T1 &&...val1) {
1451 // todo(Antares): 构造一个std::stringstream消耗很大，改为T类型实现序列化函数，
1452 // 调用 T::serialize
1453 std::stringstream sstream;
1454 sstream << val;
1455 return sstream.str() + constructString(std::forward<T1>(val1)...);
1456 }
1457 template<class... T>
1458 static std::string constructString(const std::string &a, T &&...val1) {
1459 return a + constructString(std::forward<T>(val1)...);
1460 }
1461 template<class... T>
1462 static std::string constructString(const MiraiCodeable &val, T &&...val1) {
1463 return val.toMiraiCode() + constructString(std::forward<T>(val1)...);
1464 }
1465 void create_loggerhandler() {
1466 loggerhandler.reset(new Handler);
1467 }
1468 protected:
1472 virtual void log_interface(const string &log, int level) = 0;
1473 void handler_trigger(string log, int level) {
1474 if (!loggerhandler) create_loggerhandler();
1475 if (loggerhandler->enable && loggerhandler->action) loggerhandler->action(std::move(log), level);
1476 }
1477 public:
1479 template<class... T>
1480 void info(T &&...val) {
1481 this->log_interface(constructString(std::forward<T>(val)...), 0);
1482 }
1484 template<class... T>
1485 void warning(T &&...val) {
1486 this->log_interface(constructString(std::forward<T>(val)...), 1);
1487 }
1489 template<class... T>
1490 void error(T &&...val) {
1491 this->log_interface(constructString(std::forward<T>(val)...), 2);
1492 }
1496 void registerHandle(Action action) {
1497 if (!this->loggerhandler) create_loggerhandler();
1498 this->loggerhandler->action = std::move(action);
1499 }
1503 void setHandleState(bool state) {
1504 if (!this->loggerhandler) create_loggerhandler();
1505 this->loggerhandler->enable = state;
1506 }
1507 };
1508 class MIRAICP_EXPORT Logger : public Logger_interface {
1509 private:
1510 Logger() = default;
1511 protected:
1515 void log_interface(const std::string &content, int level) override;
1516 public:
1517 static Logger logger;
1518 };
1520 class IdLogger : public Logger_interface {
1521 public:
1522 QQID id;
1523 public:
1524 IdLogger(QQID id, Logger *l) : id(id) {
1525 this->loggerhandler = l->loggerhandler;
1526 }
1527 protected:
1528 void log_interface(const std::string &content, int level) override;
1529 };
1530} // namespace MiraiCP
1531#endif //MIRAICP_PRO_LOGGER_H
1532// #include "PluginConfig.h"
1533#include <utility>
1534namespace MiraiCP {
1536 class CPPPlugin {
1537 public:
1538 // for api-compatible
1539 ShouldNotUse("请改为初始化静态常量 CPPPlugin::config") explicit CPPPlugin(const PluginConfig &) {
1540 // 不可覆盖原本的config，这里什么都不做
1541 }
1542 explicit CPPPlugin() = default;
1543 virtual ~CPPPlugin() = default;
1544 public:
1546 MIRAICP_EXPORT const static PluginConfig config;
1549 [[deprecated("Use Logger::logger instead")]] static Logger *pluginLogger;
1550 static std::unique_ptr<CPPPlugin> plugin;
1551 public:
1553 virtual void onEnable() {}
1554 virtual void onDisable() {}
1555 };
1556} // namespace MiraiCP
1557#endif //MIRAICP_PRO_CPPPLUGIN_H
1558#include <exception>
1559#include <string>
1560#include <thread>
1561namespace MiraiCP {
1564 class MIRAICP_EXPORT MiraiCPExceptionBase : public ::std::exception {
1565 protected:
1566 using string = std::string;
1567 protected:
1569 string re;
1570 public:
1572 string filename;
1574 int lineNum = 0;
1575 protected:
1577 MiraiCPExceptionBase(string info, string _filename, int _lineNum) : re(std::move(info)), filename(std::move(_filename)), lineNum(_lineNum) {}
1578 public:
1579 ~MiraiCPExceptionBase() override = default;
1580 public:
1582 const char *what() const noexcept override { return re.c_str(); }
1584 string getError() const { return re; }
1586 void raise() const;
1587 public: // 暴露的接口
1589 virtual void basicRaise() const;
1590 // CRTP实现一次，调用静态的exceptionType
1592 virtual string getExceptionType() const = 0;
1593 // 每个子类需要单独实现该静态方法
1596 static string exceptionType() { return "MiraiCPException"; }
1597 };
1606 template<class T>
1607 class MIRAICP_EXPORT MiraiCPExceptionCRTP : public MiraiCPExceptionBase {
1608 public:
1610 explicit MiraiCPExceptionCRTP(string _re, string _filename, int _lineNum) : MiraiCPExceptionBase(std::move(_re), std::move(_filename), _lineNum) {
1611 }
1612 public:
1613 // CRTP类型获取实现
1614 string getExceptionType() const override { return T::exceptionType(); }
1615 };
1619 class MIRAICP_EXPORT MiraiCPException : public MiraiCPExceptionCRTP<MiraiCPExceptionBase> {};
1622 class MIRAICP_EXPORT UploadException : public MiraiCPExceptionCRTP<UploadException> {
1623 public:
1624 explicit UploadException(const std::string &text, string _filename, int _lineNum) : MiraiCPExceptionCRTP("上传(图片/文件)异常" + text, std::move(_filename), _lineNum) {}
1625 static std::string exceptionType() { return "UploadException"; }
1626 };
1629 class MIRAICP_EXPORT IllegalStateException : public MiraiCPExceptionCRTP<IllegalStateException> {
1630 public:
1631 explicit IllegalStateException(const std::string &text, string _filename, int _lineNum) : MiraiCPExceptionCRTP("状态异常:" + text, std::move(_filename), _lineNum) {}
1632 static std::string exceptionType() { return "IllegalStateException"; }
1633 };
1636 class MIRAICP_EXPORT APIException : public MiraiCPExceptionCRTP<APIException> {
1637 public:
1638 explicit APIException(const std::string &text, string _filename, int _lineNum) : MiraiCPExceptionCRTP("MiraiCP内部无法预料的错误:" + text, std::move(_filename), _lineNum) {}
1639 static string exceptionType() { return "APIException"; }
1640 };
1643 class MIRAICP_EXPORT BotException : public MiraiCPExceptionCRTP<BotException> {
1644 public:
1645 explicit BotException(string _filename, int _lineNum) : MiraiCPExceptionCRTP("没有权限执行该操作", std::move(_filename), _lineNum) {}
1646 explicit BotException(const string &d, string _filename, int _lineNum) : MiraiCPExceptionCRTP(d, std::move(_filename), _lineNum) {}
1647 static string exceptionType() { return "BotException"; }
1648 };
1650 class MIRAICP_EXPORT BotIsBeingMutedException : public MiraiCPExceptionCRTP<BotIsBeingMutedException> {
1651 public:
1653 int timeRemain;
1654 public:
1655 explicit BotIsBeingMutedException(int t, string _filename, int _lineNum) : MiraiCPExceptionCRTP(
1656 "发送信息失败, bot已被禁言, 剩余时间" + std::to_string(t), std::move(_filename), _lineNum),
1657 timeRemain(t) {}
1658 static string exceptionType() { return "BotIsBeingMutedException"; }
1659 };
1662 class MIRAICP_EXPORT MuteException : public MiraiCPExceptionCRTP<MuteException> {
1663 public:
1664 /*
1665 * 禁言时间超出0s~30d
1666 */
1667 MuteException(string _filename, int _lineNum) : MiraiCPExceptionCRTP("禁言时长不在0s~30d中间", std::move(_filename), _lineNum) {}
1668 static string exceptionType() { return "MuteException"; }
1669 };
1672 class MIRAICP_EXPORT MemberException : public MiraiCPExceptionCRTP<MemberException> {
1673 public:
1674 enum MemberExceptionType : int {
1675 OtherType,
1676 NoSuchGroup,
1677 NoSuchMember
1678 };
1679 MemberExceptionType type = OtherType;
1680 /*
1681 * "1" - 找不到群
1682 * "2" - 找不到群成员
1683 */
1684 explicit MemberException(int _type, string _filename, int _lineNum) : MiraiCPExceptionCRTP(
1685 [&]() -> string {
1686 type = MemberExceptionType(_type);
1687 switch (type) {
1688 case NoSuchGroup:
1689 return "找不到群";
1690 case NoSuchMember:
1691 return "找不到群成员";
1692 default:
1693 return "";
1694 }
1695 }(),
1696 std::move(_filename), _lineNum) {}
1697 static string exceptionType() { return "MemberException"; }
1698 };
1701 class MIRAICP_EXPORT FriendException : public MiraiCPExceptionCRTP<FriendException> {
1702 public:
1703 /*
1704 * 找不到好友
1705 */
1706 FriendException(string _filename, int _lineNum) : MiraiCPExceptionCRTP("找不到好友", std::move(_filename), _lineNum) {}
1707 static string exceptionType() { return "FriendException"; }
1708 };
1711 class MIRAICP_EXPORT GroupException : public MiraiCPExceptionCRTP<GroupException> {
1712 public:
1713 GroupException(string _filename, int _lineNum) : MiraiCPExceptionCRTP("找不到群", std::move(_filename), _lineNum) {}
1714 static string exceptionType() { return "GroupException"; }
1715 };

1719 public:
1720 RecallException(string _filename, int _lineNum) : MiraiCPExceptionCRTP("该消息已经被撤回", std::move(_filename), _lineNum) {}
1721 static string exceptionType() { return "RecallException"; }
1722 };
1725 class MIRAICP_EXPORT RemoteAssetException : public MiraiCPExceptionCRTP<RemoteAssetException> {
1726 public:

1729 };

1735 }

1737 };

1750 static string exceptionType() { return "EventCancelledException"; }
1751 };
1756 class MIRAICP_EXPORT PluginNotAuthorizedException : public MiraiCPExceptionCRTP<PluginNotAuthorizedException> {

1760 };
1765 class MIRAICP_EXPORT PluginNotEnabledException : public MiraiCPExceptionCRTP<PluginNotEnabledException> {
1766 public:
1767 explicit PluginNotEnabledException(string _filename, int _lineNum) : MiraiCPExceptionCRTP("插件" + CPPPlugin::config.getId() + "未加载", std::move(_filename), _lineNum) {}
1768 static string exceptionType() { return "PluginNotEnabledException"; }
1769 };
1772 class MiraiCPThreadException : public MiraiCPExceptionCRTP<MiraiCPThreadException> {
1773 public:
1775 std::thread::id threadId;
1776 public:
1777 explicit MiraiCPThreadException(const std::string &exception_content, std::thread::id threadId, string _filename, int _lineNum)
1778 : MiraiCPExceptionCRTP(exception_content + " at threadId: " + getThreadIdStr(threadId), std::move(_filename), _lineNum),
1779 threadId(threadId) {}
1780 public:
1781 std::string getThreadIdStr() const { return getThreadIdStr(threadId); }
1782 public:
1783 static string exceptionType() { return "MiraiCPThreadException"; }
1784 private:
1785 MIRAICP_EXPORT static std::string getThreadIdStr(const std::thread::id &id);
1786 };
1787 void ErrorHandle0(const std::string &name, int line, const std::string &re, const std::string &ErrorMsg = "");

1806#ifndef MIRAICP_PRO_SINGLEMESSAGE_H
1807#define MIRAICP_PRO_SINGLEMESSAGE_H
1808// #include "MiraiCPMacros.h"
1809// #include "MessageSource.h"
1810#ifndef MIRAICP_PRO_MESSAGESOURCE_H
1811#define MIRAICP_PRO_MESSAGESOURCE_H
1812// #include "MiraiCPMacros.h"
1813// -----------------------
1814// #include "commonTypes.h"
1815#include <string>
1816namespace MiraiCP {
1817 class MiraiCodeable; // forward declaration
1821 class MessageSource {
1822 public:
1824 std::string ids;
1826 std::string internalids;
1828 std::string source;
1829 MessageSource() = default;
1831 ShouldNotUse("Use Contact.quoteAndSendMessage") MessageSource
1832 quoteAndSendMiraiCode(MiraiCodeable *msg, QQID groupid = 0,
1833 void *env = nullptr) const = delete;
1835 ShouldNotUse("Use Contact.quoteAndSendMessage") MessageSource
1836 quoteAndSendMsg(const std::string &c, QQID groupid = 0,
1837 void * = nullptr) const = delete;
1839 ShouldNotUse("Use Contact.quoteAndSendMessage") MessageSource
1840 quoteAndSendMiraiCode(const std::string &c, QQID groupid = 0,
1841 void * = nullptr) const = delete;
1848 MessageSource(std::string ids, std::string internalids, std::string source);
1856 static MessageSource deserializeFromString(const std::string &source);
1857 std::string serializeToString() const;
1859 void recall() const;
1860 bool operator==(const MessageSource &ms) const {
1861 return this->ids == ms.ids && this->internalids == ms.internalids;
1862 }
1863 };
1864} // namespace MiraiCP
1865#endif //MIRAICP_PRO_MESSAGESOURCE_H
1866// #include "MiraiCode.h"
1867#include <array>
1868#include <json_fwd.hpp>
1869#include <optional>
1870#include <sstream>
1871#include <unordered_map>
1872#include <utility>
1873namespace MiraiCP {
1874 // todo(Antares): delete these after the whole refactor is finished
1875#define SINGLEMESSAGE_REFACTOR_ASSERTION(x, y) static_assert((x) == (y), "static assertion failed when refactoring code")
1876 namespace SingleMessageType {
1877 // id 小于 0 的是不能直接发送的消息(仅在接收的 MessageChain 里出现)
1878 MIRAICP_ITERABLE_ENUM( // NOLINT(cert-dcl21-cpp)
1879 -6, // begin at
1880 MessageSource_t, // -6
1881 MarketFace_t, // -5
1882 OnlineForwardedMessage_t, // -4
1883 OnlineAudio_t, // -3
1884 QuoteReply_t, // -2
1885 UnsupportedMessage_t, // -1
1886 PlainText_t, // 0
1887 At_t, // 1
1888 AtAll_t, // 2
1889 Image_t, // 3
1890 LightApp_t, // 4
1891 ServiceMessage_t, // 5
1892 RemoteFile_t, // 6
1893 Face_t, // 7
1894 FlashImage_t, // 8
1895 MusicShare_t // 9, End = 10
1896 )
1897 constexpr const char *miraiCodeNameInternal[] = {
1898 "NoExists", // 0
1899 "NoExists", // 1
1900 "NoExists", // 2
1901 "NoExists", // 3
1902 "NoExists", // 4
1903 "NoExists", // 5
1904 "NoExists", // 6
1905 "at", // 7
1906 "atall", // 8
1907 "image", // 9
1908 "app", // 10
1909 "service", // 11
1910 "file", // 12
1911 "face", // 13
1912 "flash", // 14
1913 "musicshare" // 15
1914 };
1915 constexpr const char *messageTypeInternal[] = {
1916 "MessageSource", // -6
1917 "MarketFace", // -5
1918 "ForwardMessage", // -4
1919 "OnlineAudio", // -3
1920 "QuoteReply", // -2
1921 "UnsupportedMessage", // -1
1922 "PlainText", // 0 <-- messageType is here
1923 "At", // 1
1924 "AtAll", // 2
1925 "Image", // 3
1926 "LightApp", // 4
1927 "SimpleServiceMessage", // 5
1928 "FileMessage", // 6
1929 "Face", // 7
1930 "FlashImage", // 8
1931 "MusicShare", // 9
1932 };
1933 static_assert(sizeof(messageTypeInternal) / sizeof(*messageTypeInternal) == SingleMessageType::End - SingleMessageType::Begin);
1934 } // namespace SingleMessageType
1936 struct URLSharer {
1938 std::string brief = "简介 没点进来看见的样子";
1940 std::string url = "目标url";
1942 std::string cover = "图标地址";
1944 std::string title = "标题";
1946 std::string summary = "描述文字";
1947 };
1949 class MIRAICP_EXPORT SingleMessage : public MiraiCodeable {
1950 public:
1951 public:
1952 using Types = SingleMessageType::Type;
1953 std::string content;
1954 std::string prefix;
1957 int internalType = SingleMessageType::UnsupportedMessage_t;
1958 protected:
1961 SingleMessage() = default; // NOLINT(cppcoreguidelines-pro-type-member-init)
1962 public:
1963 static const char *const *const messageType;
1964 static const char *const *const miraiCodeName;
1965 static std::string getTypeString(int type) {
1966 return messageType[type];
1967 }
1968 public:
1973 SingleMessage(int inType, std::string content, std::string prefix = ":") noexcept
1974 : content(std::move(content)),
1975 prefix(std::move(prefix)),
1976 internalType(inType) {}
1977 virtual ~SingleMessage() noexcept = default;
1978 public:
1982 static int getKey(const std::string &value);
1988 static int getMiraiCodeKey(const std::string &value);
1989 public:
1990 [[nodiscard]] virtual nlohmann::json toJson() const;
1991 [[nodiscard]] std::string toMiraiCode() const override;
1992 public:
1993 bool operator==(const SingleMessage &m) const {
1994 return this->internalType == m.internalType && this->toMiraiCode() == m.toMiraiCode();
1995 }
1996 bool operator==(SingleMessage *m) const {
1997 return this->internalType == m->internalType && this->toMiraiCode() == m->toMiraiCode();
1998 }
1999 };
2001 class MIRAICP_EXPORT PlainText : public SingleMessage {
2002 public:
2003 explicit PlainText(const SingleMessage &sg);
2004 PlainText(PlainText &&_o) noexcept = default;
2005 PlainText(const PlainText &_o) = default;
2006 explicit PlainText(std::string inStr) noexcept : SingleMessage(PlainText::type(), std::move(inStr)) {}
2007 template<typename Stringable, typename = decltype(std::to_string(std::declval<Stringable>()))>
2008 explicit PlainText(Stringable val) : SingleMessage(PlainText::type(), std::to_string(val)) {}
2009 public:
2010 static int type() {
2011 SINGLEMESSAGE_REFACTOR_ASSERTION(0, Types::PlainText_t);
2012 return Types::PlainText_t;
2013 }
2014 public:
2015 [[nodiscard]] std::string toMiraiCode() const override {
2016 return content;
2017 }
2018 [[nodiscard]] nlohmann::json toJson() const override;
2019 bool operator==(const PlainText &p) const {
2020 return this->content == p.content;
2021 }
2022 };
2023 // todo(Antares): 除特殊情况外（子类与基类没有差异）应禁止子类使用父类对象进行构造；或者构造函数直接调用downcast（不安全）
2024 // 例如 At(const SingleMessage &) 这样的构造函数不应该出现
2026 class MIRAICP_EXPORT At : public SingleMessage {
2027 public:
2028 static int type() {
2029 SINGLEMESSAGE_REFACTOR_ASSERTION(1, Types::At_t);
2030 return Types::At_t;
2031 }
2032 QQID target;
2033 [[nodiscard]] nlohmann::json toJson() const override;
2034 explicit At(const SingleMessage &sg);
2035 explicit At(QQID a) : SingleMessage(At::type(), std::to_string(a)), target(a) {};
2036 [[nodiscard]] std::string toMiraiCode() const override {
2037 return "[mirai:at:" + std::to_string(this->target) + "] "; // 后面有个空格
2038 }
2039 bool operator==(const At &a) const {
2040 return this->target == a.target;
2041 }
2042 };
2044 class MIRAICP_EXPORT AtAll : public SingleMessage {
2045 public:
2046 static int type() {
2047 SINGLEMESSAGE_REFACTOR_ASSERTION(2, Types::AtAll_t);
2048 return Types::AtAll_t;
2049 }
2050 [[nodiscard]] std::string toMiraiCode() const override {
2051 return "[mirai:atall] ";
2052 }
2053 [[nodiscard]] nlohmann::json toJson() const override;
2054 AtAll() : SingleMessage(AtAll::type(), "", "") {}
2055 };
2057 class MIRAICP_EXPORT Image : public SingleMessage {
2058 public:
2059 static int type() {
2060 SINGLEMESSAGE_REFACTOR_ASSERTION(3, Types::Image_t);
2061 return Types::Image_t;
2062 }
2063 //图片id，样式:` {xxx}.xx `
2064 std::string id;
2075 std::string imageType;
2077 std::optional<std::string> md5;
2079 std::optional<std::string> url;
2081 size_t size{};
2083 int width{};
2085 int height{};
2087 bool isEmoji{};
2095 bool isUploaded(QQID botid);
2096 protected:
2099 Image() = default; // NOLINT(cppcoreguidelines-pro-type-member-init)
2100 public:
2111 explicit Image(const std::string &imageId, size_t size = 0, int width = 0, int height = 0,
2112 std::string type = "PNG",
2113 bool isEmoji = false)
2114 : SingleMessage(Image::type(), imageId), id(imageId), imageType(std::move(type)), size(size),
2115 width(width), height(height), isEmoji(isEmoji) {
2116 // todo(Antares): 实际上重复的属性 id 和 content
2117 }
2119 void refreshInfo();
2121 [[nodiscard]] std::string toMiraiCode() const override {
2122 return "[mirai:image:" + this->id + "]";
2123 }
2124 [[nodiscard]] nlohmann::json toJson() const override;
2125 static Image deserialize(const std::string &);
2126 bool operator==(const Image &i) const {
2127 return this->id == i.id;
2128 }
2129 };
2131 class MIRAICP_EXPORT FlashImage : public Image {
2132 public:
2133 static int type() {
2134 SINGLEMESSAGE_REFACTOR_ASSERTION(8, Types::FlashImage_t);
2135 return Types::FlashImage_t;
2136 }
2137 [[nodiscard]] std::string toMiraiCode() const override {
2138 return "[mirai:flash:" + this->id + "]";
2139 }
2140 explicit FlashImage(const std::string &imageId, size_t size = 0, int width = 0, int height = 0,
2141 std::string type = "PNG") : Image(imageId, size, width, height, std::move(type)) {
2142 this->SingleMessage::internalType = Types::FlashImage_t;
2143 }
2144 explicit FlashImage(const Image &img);
2145 [[nodiscard]] nlohmann::json toJson() const override;
2146 static FlashImage deserialize(const std::string &);
2147 bool operator==(const FlashImage &i) const {
2148 return this->id == i.id;
2149 }
2151 Image toImage() { return Image(*this); }
2152 };

2161 SINGLEMESSAGE_REFACTOR_ASSERTION(4, Types::LightApp_t);
2162 return Types::LightApp_t;
2163 }

2167 explicit LightApp(const SingleMessage &sg);

2174 };
2177 class MIRAICP_EXPORT ServiceMessage : public SingleMessage {
2178 public:
2179 static int type() {
2180 SINGLEMESSAGE_REFACTOR_ASSERTION(5, Types::ServiceMessage_t);
2181 return Types::ServiceMessage_t;
2182 }
2183 [[nodiscard]] nlohmann::json toJson() const override;
2184 [[nodiscard]] std::string toMiraiCode() const override;
2185 int id;
2189 explicit ServiceMessage(int id, std::string a) : SingleMessage(ServiceMessage::type(), std::move(a),
2190 ":" + std::to_string(id) + ','),
2191 id(id) {}
2192 explicit ServiceMessage(const SingleMessage &sg);
2193 explicit ServiceMessage(const URLSharer &a) : SingleMessage(5,
2194 R"(<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><msg templateID="12345" action="web" brief=")" +
2195 a.brief + R"(" serviceID="1" url=")" + a.url +
2196 R"("><item layout="2"><picture cover=")" +
2197 a.cover + "\"/><title>" + a.title +
2198 "</title><summary>" + a.summary +
2199 "</summary></item><source/></msg>",
2200 ":1,"),
2201 id(1) {}
2202 bool operator==(const ServiceMessage &s) const {
2203 return this->content == s.content;
2204 }
2205 };

2215 return "";
2216 }

2220 explicit QuoteReply(MessageSource source) : SingleMessage(QuoteReply::type(), source.serializeToString()), source(std::move(source)){};
2221 bool operator==(const QuoteReply &qr) const {

2223 }

2225 };

2258 class MIRAICP_EXPORT RemoteFile : public SingleMessage {
2259 public:

2263 }
2266 struct Dinfo {

2270 std::string md5;
2272 std::string sha1;
2273 };
2276 struct Finfo {
2278 QQID size;
2280 QQID uploaderid;
2282 long expirytime;
2284 QQID uploadtime;
2286 QQID lastmodifytime;
2287 };
2289 std::string id;
2291 unsigned int internalid;

2295 long long size;

2303 std::optional<Dinfo> dinfo;
2307 std::optional<Finfo> finfo;

2309 RemoteFile plus(unsigned int ii);
2310 static RemoteFile deserializeFromString(const std::string &source);
2321 explicit RemoteFile(const std::string &i, unsigned int ii, std::string n, long long s, std::string p, struct Dinfo d, struct Finfo f);
2332 explicit RemoteFile(const std::string &i, unsigned int ii, std::string n, long long s);
2334 ShouldNotUse("Cannot send manually, use Group.sendFile") std::string toMiraiCode() const override {
2335 return "";
2336 }
2337 bool operator==(const RemoteFile &rf) const {
2338 return this->id == rf.id;
2339 }
2340 };

2363 class MIRAICP_EXPORT MusicShare : public SingleMessage {

2367 return Types::MusicShare_t;
2368 }

2376 std::string jumpUrl;

2380 std::string musicUrl;

2384 return "[mirai:musicshare:" + appName + "," + title + "," + summary + "," + jumpUrl + "," + picUrl + "," + musicUrl + "," + brief + "]";
2385 }
2386 MusicShare(std::string appName,
2387 std::string title,
2388 std::string summary,
2389 std::string jumpUrl,
2390 std::string picUrl,
2391 std::string musicUrl,
2392 std::string brief)
2393 : SingleMessage(MusicShare::type(), ""),
2394 appName(std::move(appName)),
2395 title(std::move(title)),
2396 summary(std::move(summary)),
2397 jumpUrl(std::move(jumpUrl)),
2398 picUrl(std::move(picUrl)),
2399 musicUrl(std::move(musicUrl)),
2400 brief(std::move(brief)) {}
2401 };
2402 class MIRAICP_EXPORT MarketFace : public SingleMessage {

2406 return Types::MarketFace_t;

2410 return "";
2411 }

2416 }
2417 };
2419 class MIRAICP_EXPORT UnSupportMessage : public SingleMessage {
2420 public:
2421 static int type() {
2422 SINGLEMESSAGE_REFACTOR_ASSERTION(-1, Types::UnsupportedMessage_t);
2423 return Types::UnsupportedMessage_t;
2424 }
2425 [[nodiscard]] nlohmann::json toJson() const override;
2427 ShouldNotUse("不支持直接发送UnSupportMessage") std::string toMiraiCode() const override {
2428 return "";
2429 }
2430 explicit UnSupportMessage(const SingleMessage &s) : SingleMessage(s){};
2431 explicit UnSupportMessage(const std::string &content) : SingleMessage(UnSupportMessage::type(), content) {}
2432 bool operator==(const UnSupportMessage &m) const {
2433 return this->content == m.content;
2434 }
2435 };

2455#ifndef MIRAICP_PRO_COMMONTOOLS_H
2456#define MIRAICP_PRO_COMMONTOOLS_H
2457// #include "MiraiCPMacros.h"
2458// -----------------------
2459#include <functional>
2460namespace CommonTools {
2463 class MiraiCPDefer {
2464 public:
2465 std::function<void()> defer_func;
2466 MiraiCPDefer(std::function<void()> func) : defer_func(std::move(func)) {
2467 }
2468 ~MiraiCPDefer() {
2469 defer_func();
2470 }
2471 };
2472} // namespace CommonTools
2473#endif //MIRAICP_PRO_COMMONTOOLS_H
2474namespace MiraiCP {
2475 class MessageSource; // forward declaration
2476 namespace internal {
2479 class Message : public std::shared_ptr<SingleMessage> {
2480 typedef std::shared_ptr<SingleMessage> Super;
2481 public:
2482#if MIRAICP_MSVC
2483 Message() {} // for MSVC compatible, Message should be default constructable. See MessageChain
2484#endif
2485 template<typename T, typename = std::enable_if<std::is_base_of_v<SingleMessage, T>>>
2486 explicit Message(T msg) {
2487 reset(new T(std::move(msg)));
2488 }
2489 explicit Message(Super msgptr) noexcept : Super(std::move(msgptr)) {}
2490 // dev: DON'T write copy and move constructors here, otherwise add operator= overloads. See MessageChain
2491 public:
2494 [[nodiscard]] int getType() const {
2495 return (*this)->internalType;
2496 };
2499 template<class T>
2500 T getVal() const {
2501 // for dev: 不用 get 为了不和shared_ptr重叠
2502 static_assert(std::is_base_of_v<SingleMessage, T>, "只支持SingleMessage的派生类");
2503 if (T::type() != getType())
2504 throw IllegalArgumentException(
2505 "cannot convert from " + SingleMessage::getTypeString(getType()) + " to " +
2506 SingleMessage::getTypeString(T::type()),
2507 MIRAICP_EXCEPTION_WHERE);
2508 T *re = static_cast<T *>(std::shared_ptr<SingleMessage>::get());
2509 if (re == nullptr)
2510 throw IllegalArgumentException(
2511 "cannot convert from " + SingleMessage::getTypeString(getType()) + " to " +
2512 SingleMessage::getTypeString(T::type()),
2513 MIRAICP_EXCEPTION_WHERE);
2514 return *re;
2515 }
2516 [[nodiscard]] std::string toMiraiCode() const {
2517 return (*this)->toMiraiCode();
2518 }
2519 [[nodiscard]] std::string toJson() const {
2520 return (*this)->toJson();
2521 }
2522 bool operator==(const Message &m) const {
2523 return (*this)->internalType == m->internalType && (*this)->toMiraiCode() == m->toMiraiCode();
2524 }
2525 bool operator!=(const Message &m) const {
2526 return (*this)->internalType != m->internalType || (*this)->toMiraiCode() != m->toMiraiCode();
2527 }
2528 };
2529 } // namespace internal
2531 class MIRAICP_EXPORT MessageChain : public std::vector<internal::Message>, public MiraiCodeable {
2532 public: // typedefs
2533 using Message = internal::Message;
2534 public:
2536 std::optional<MessageSource> source = std::nullopt;
2537 public:
2538 MessageChain(const MessageChain &_o) = default;
2539 MessageChain(MessageChain &&_o) = default;
2540 MessageChain() = default;
2541 ~MessageChain() override = default;
2550 template<typename... T, typename = std::enable_if_t<!std::is_same_v<std::decay_t<T>..., MessageChain>>>
2551 explicit MessageChain(T &&...args) {
2552 constructMessages(std::forward<T>(args)...);
2553 };
2555 template<class... T>
2556 explicit MessageChain(MessageSource ms, T &&...args) : source(std::move(ms)) {
2557 this->constructMessages(std::forward<T>(args)...);
2558 };
2559 public:
2560 [[deprecated("MessageChain继承自std::vector<Message>，无需获取内部vector")]] const std::vector<Message> &vector() const {
2561 return static_cast<const std::vector<Message> &>(*this);
2562 }
2563 std::string toMiraiCode() const override;
2564 std::vector<std::string> toMiraiCodeVector() const {
2565 std::vector<std::string> tmp;
2566 for (auto &&a: *this)
2567 tmp.emplace_back(a->toMiraiCode());
2568 return tmp;
2569 }
2570 nlohmann::json toJson() const;
2575 std::string toString() const;
2579 template<class T>
2580 void add(const T &a) {
2581 static_assert(std::is_base_of_v<SingleMessage, T>, "只接受SingleMessage的子类");
2582 emplace_back(a);
2583 }
2584 void add(const MessageSource &val) {
2585 source = val;
2586 }
2588 template<class T>
2589 std::vector<T> filter() {
2590 static_assert(std::is_base_of_v<SingleMessage, T>, "只支持SingleMessage的子类");
2591 std::vector<T> re;
2592 for (auto &&a: *this) {
2593 if (a.getType() == T::type())
2594 re.emplace_back(a.getVal<T>());
2595 }
2596 return re;
2597 }
2599 template<class T>
2600 std::vector<T> filter(const std::function<bool(const Message &)> &func) {
2601 static_assert(std::is_base_of_v<SingleMessage, T>, "只支持SingleMessage的子类");
2602 std::vector<T> re;
2603 for (auto &&a: *this) {
2604 if (func(a))
2605 re.push_back(a.getVal<T>());
2606 }
2607 return re;
2608 }
2610 template<class T>
2611 std::optional<T> first() {
2612 for (auto &&a: *this)
2613 if (a.getType() == T::type())
2614 return a.getVal<T>();
2615 return std::nullopt;
2616 }
2617 template<class T>
2618 [[nodiscard]] MessageChain plus(const T &a) const {
2619 static_assert(std::is_base_of_v<SingleMessage, T>, "只支持SingleMessage的子类");
2620 MessageChain tmp(*this);
2621 tmp.emplace_back(a);
2622 return tmp;
2623 }
2624 [[nodiscard]] MessageChain plus(const MessageChain &mc) const {
2625 MessageChain tmp(*this);
2626 tmp.insert(tmp.end(), mc.begin(), mc.end());
2627 return tmp;
2628 }
2629 [[nodiscard]] MessageChain plus(const MessageSource &ms) const {
2630 MessageChain tmp(*this);
2631 tmp.source = ms;
2632 return tmp;
2633 }
2634 template<class T>
2635 MessageChain operator+(const T &msg) const {
2636 return this->plus(msg);
2637 }
2638 bool operator==(const MessageChain &mc) const {
2639 if (size() != mc.size())
2640 return false;
2641 for (size_t i = 0; i < size(); i++) {
2642 if ((*this)[i] != mc[i])
2643 return false;
2644 }
2645 return true;
2646 }
2647 bool operator!=(const MessageChain &mc) const {
2648 return !(*this == mc);
2649 }
2650 bool empty() const {
2651 return std::vector<Message>::empty() || toMiraiCode().empty();
2652 }
2662 template<class T>
2663 ShouldNotUse("use Contact.quoteAndSend") MessageSource
2664 quoteAndSendMessage(T s, QQID groupid = -1, void *env = nullptr) = delete;
2665 public: // static functions
2670 static size_t findEnd(const std::string &s, size_t start) {
2671 size_t pos = start;
2672 while (pos < s.length()) {
2673 switch (s[pos]) {
2674 case '\\':
2675 pos += 2;
2676 continue;
2677 case ']':
2678 return pos;
2679 }
2680 pos++;
2681 }
2682 return -1;
2683 }
2685 static MessageChain deserializationFromMiraiCode(const std::string &m);
2686 static MessageChain deserializationFromMessageSourceJson(const std::string &msg, bool origin = true) {
2687 return deserializationFromMessageSourceJson(nlohmann::json::parse(msg), origin);
2688 }
2691 static MessageChain deserializationFromMessageSourceJson(nlohmann::json j, bool origin = true);
2694 static MessageChain deserializationFromMessageJson(const nlohmann::json &j);
2695 private: // private methods
2696 void constructMessages() {}
2697 template<class T1, class... T2>
2698 void constructMessages(T1 &&h, T2 &&...args) {
2699 static_assert(std::is_base_of_v<SingleMessage, typename std::decay_t<T1>>,
2700 "只支持SingleMessage子类");
2701 emplace_back(std::forward<T1>(h));
2702 constructMessages(std::forward<T2>(args)...);
2703 }
2704 template<class... T2>
2705 void constructMessages(const std::string &h, T2 &&...args) {
2706 emplace_back(PlainText(h));
2707 constructMessages(std::forward<T2>(args)...);
2708 }
2709 template<class... T2>
2710 void constructMessages(const char *h, T2 &&...args) {
2711 emplace_back(PlainText(h));
2712 constructMessages(std::forward<T2>(args)...);
2713 }
2714 template<class... T>
2715 void constructMessages(const MessageChain &mc, T &&...args) {
2716 insert(end(), mc.begin(), mc.end());
2717 constructMessages(std::forward<T>(args)...);
2718 }
2719 };
2720} // namespace MiraiCP
2721#endif //MIRAICP_PRO_MESSAGECHAIN_H
2722#include <json_fwd.hpp>
2723#include <string>
2724namespace MiraiCP {
2726 enum ContactType {
2727 MIRAI_CONTACT = 0,
2729 MIRAI_FRIEND = 1,
2731 MIRAI_GROUP = 2,
2733 MIRAI_MEMBER = 3,
2735 MIRAI_BOT = 4,
2736 MIRAI_OTHERTYPE = 5,
2737 };
2739 struct IContactData : public IMiraiData {
2741 std::string _nickOrNameCard;
2743 std::string _avatarUrl;
2745 QQID _id{};
2747 QQID _botId{};
2749 ContactType _type = MIRAI_CONTACT;
2750 void deserialize(nlohmann::json inJson) override;
2751 nlohmann::json internalToJson() const override;
2753 void refreshInfo() override;
2759 void updateJson(nlohmann::json &jsonToUpdate) const;
2760 };
2761 struct GroupRelatedData : public IContactData {
2762 typedef IContactData Super;
2764 QQID _groupId;
2765 nlohmann::json internalToJson() const override;
2766 explicit GroupRelatedData(QQID in_groupid) : _groupId(in_groupid) {}
2767 };
2772 class Contact {
2773 template<typename ClassType, typename InternalDataType>
2774 friend struct ContactDataHelper;
2775 // attrs
2776 protected:
2778 std::shared_ptr<IContactData> InternalData;
2779 public:
2784 Contact() = delete;
2785 protected:
2786 explicit Contact(std::shared_ptr<IContactData> Data) {
2787 SetInternalData(std::move(Data));
2788 }
2789 public:
2791 virtual ~Contact() = default;
2792 bool operator==(const Contact &c) const {
2793 return this->id() == c.id();
2794 }
2799 void SetInternalData(std::shared_ptr<IContactData> Data) { InternalData = std::move(Data); }
2805 void refreshInfo() {
2806 InternalData->requestRefresh();
2807 }
2813 void forceRefreshNextTime() {
2814 InternalData->forceRefreshNextTime();
2815 }
2821 void forceRefreshNow() {
2822 forceRefreshNextTime();
2823 refreshInfo();
2824 }
2833 ContactType type() const { return InternalData->_type; }
2842 QQID id() const { return InternalData->_id; }
2847 QQID botid() const { return InternalData->_botId; };
2858 template<typename T>
2859 MessageSource quoteAndSendMessage(const T &s, MessageSource ms) {
2860 return this->quoteAndSend1(s, ms);
2861 }
2872 template<typename... T>
2873 MessageSource quoteAndSendMessage(const MessageSource &ms, T &&...val) {
2874 return this->quoteAndSend1(MessageChain(std::forward<T>(val)...), ms);
2875 }
2886 template<typename... T>
2887 MessageSource sendMessage(T &&...msg) {
2888 return this->sendMessage(MessageChain(std::forward<T>(msg)...));
2889 }
2900 template<typename T>
2901 MessageSource sendMessage(T &&msg) {
2902 return this->unpackMsg(MessageChain(std::forward<T>(msg)));
2903 }
2904 private: // private methods
2905 MessageSource quoteAndSend0(std::string msg, const MessageSource &ms) const;
2906 MessageSource quoteAndSend1(const SingleMessage &s, const MessageSource &ms) {
2907 return this->quoteAndSend0(MessageChain(s).toString(), ms);
2908 }
2909 MessageSource quoteAndSend1(const std::string &s, const MessageSource &ms) {
2910 return this->quoteAndSend0(s, ms);
2911 }
2912 MessageSource quoteAndSend1(const MessageChain &mc, const MessageSource &ms) {
2913 return this->quoteAndSend0(mc.toString(), ms);
2914 }
2915 public: // serialization
2917 nlohmann::json toJson() const { return InternalData->toJson(); }
2919 void updateJson(nlohmann::json &j) const { InternalData->updateJson(j); }
2924 std::string toString() const {
2925 return toJson().dump();
2926 }
2929 static std::shared_ptr<Contact> deserializeToPointer(nlohmann::json source);
2930 // for derived class
2931 template<class T>
2932 static T deserialize(nlohmann::json source) {
2933 static_assert(std::is_base_of_v<Contact, T>, "Cannot deserialize class that isn't base on Contact");
2934 return T(std::move(source));
2935 }
2944 Image uploadImg(const std::string &path) const;
2945 FlashImage uploadFlashImg(const std::string &path) const;
2946 protected:
2948 MessageSource sendVoiceImpl(std::string path) const;
2951 MessageSource sendMsgImpl(std::string msg) const;
2952 MessageSource unpackMsg(const MessageChain &msg) const {
2953 return sendMsgImpl(msg.toString());
2954 }
2955 MessageSource unpackMsg(const MiraiCodeable &msg) const {
2956 return sendMsgImpl(MessageChain::deserializationFromMiraiCode(msg.toMiraiCode()).toString());
2957 }
2958 MessageSource unpackMsg(std::string msg) const {
2959 return sendMsgImpl(MessageChain(PlainText(std::move(msg))).toString());
2960 }
2961 MessageSource unpackMsg(const char *msg) const {
2962 return sendMsgImpl(MessageChain(PlainText(msg)).toString());
2963 }
2964 };
2967 template<typename ClassType, typename InternalDataType>
2968 struct ContactDataHelper {
2969 typedef InternalDataType DataType;
2970 protected:
2971 using json = nlohmann::json;
2978 DataType *GetDataInternal() const {
2979 auto clz_ptr = static_cast<const ClassType *>(this);
2980 assert(clz_ptr->InternalData != nullptr);
2981 return static_cast<DataType *>(clz_ptr->InternalData.get());
2982 }
2983 public:
2985 std::string nickOrNameCard() const {
2986 auto dataPtr = GetDataInternal();
2987 dataPtr->requestRefresh();
2988 std::shared_lock<std::shared_mutex> local_lck(dataPtr->getMutex());
2989 return dataPtr->_nickOrNameCard;
2990 };
2992 std::string avatarUrl() const {
2993 auto dataPtr = GetDataInternal();
2994 dataPtr->requestRefresh();
2995 std::shared_lock<std::shared_mutex> local_lck(dataPtr->getMutex());
2996 return dataPtr->_avatarUrl;
2997 };
2998 };
2999 class INudgeSupport {
3000 public:
3007 virtual void sendNudge() = 0;
3008 };
3009} // namespace MiraiCP
3010#endif //MIRAICP_PRO_CONTACT_H

3019 class Bot: public Contact {
3020 public:

3026 public:
3032 [[nodiscard]] Friend getFriend(QQID i) const;
3038 [[nodiscard]] Group getGroup(QQID groupid) const;
3040 std::string nick();
3042 std::string avatarUrl();
3044 [[nodiscard]] std::vector<QQID> getFriendList() const;
3046 [[nodiscard]] std::string FriendListToString() const;
3048 [[nodiscard]] std::vector<QQID> getGroupList() const;
3050 [[nodiscard]] std::string GroupListToString() const;
3051 bool operator==(const Bot &b) const {
3052 return id() == b.id();
3053 }
3054 };

3060// #include "PluginConfig.h"
3061#include <utility>
3062namespace MiraiCP {
3064 class CPPPlugin {
3065 public:
3066 // for api-compatible
3067 ShouldNotUse("请改为初始化静态常量 CPPPlugin::config") explicit CPPPlugin(const PluginConfig &) {
3068 // 不可覆盖原本的config，这里什么都不做
3069 }
3070 explicit CPPPlugin() = default;
3071 virtual ~CPPPlugin() = default;
3072 public:
3074 MIRAICP_EXPORT const static PluginConfig config;
3077 [[deprecated("Use Logger::logger instead")]] static Logger *pluginLogger;

3086#ifndef MIRAICP_PRO_COMMAND_H
3087#define MIRAICP_PRO_COMMAND_H
3088// #include "CPPPlugin.h"
3089// #include "Exception.h"
3090// #include "KtOperation.h"
3091// #include "Logger.h"
3092// #include "commonTools.h"
3093#include <optional>
3094namespace MiraiCP {
3095 class MessageChain;
3096 class Bot;
3097 class Contact;
3103 class IRawCommand {
3104 using string = std::string;
3105 public:
3106 struct Config {
3107 public:
3109 string primaryName;
3111 std::vector<string> secondNames;
3113 string usage = "null";
3115 string description = "null";
3117 bool overrideOrigin = false;
3119 bool preFixOption = false;
3120 };
3121 virtual IRawCommand::Config config() = 0;
3122 virtual void onCommand(std::shared_ptr<Contact>, const Bot &, const MessageChain &) = 0;
3123 IRawCommand() = default;
3124 virtual ~IRawCommand() = default;
3125 };
3126 class CommandManager {
3127 private:
3128 CommandManager() = default;
3129 std::vector<std::shared_ptr<IRawCommand>> commandList;
3130 public:
3131 std::shared_ptr<IRawCommand> &operator[](const int &index) { return commandList[index]; }
3137 template<class T>
3138 bool registerCommand(T command) {
3139 static_assert(std::is_base_of_v<IRawCommand, T>, "只支持IRawCommand的派生类");
3140 nlohmann::json j;
3141 j["pluginId"] = CPPPlugin::config.id;
3142 j["usage"] = command.config().usage;
3143 j["primaryName"] = command.config().primaryName;
3144 j["secondName"] = command.config().secondNames;
3145 j["description"] = command.config().description;
3146 j["override"] = command.config().overrideOrigin;
3147 j["preFixOption"] = command.config().preFixOption;
3148 size_t before = commandList.size();
3149 std::shared_ptr<IRawCommand> c;
3150 c.reset(new T(command));
3151 commandList.push_back(c);
3152 size_t now = commandList.size();
3153 if (now - before == 1)
3154 j["bindId"] = now - 1;
3155 else {
3156 auto i = std::find(commandList.begin(), commandList.end(), c);
3157 if (i != commandList.end())
3158 j["bindId"] = i - commandList.begin();
3159 else
3160 throw IllegalArgumentException("找不到合适的bindId", MIRAICP_EXCEPTION_WHERE);
3161 }
3162 std::string re = KtOperation::ktOperation(KtOperation::CommandReg, j);
3163 return re == "true";
3164 }
3165 static CommandManager commandManager;
3166 };
3167} // namespace MiraiCP
3168#endif //MIRAICP_PRO_COMMAND_H
3169// Copyright (c) 2020 - 2023. Eritque arcus and contributors.

3171// This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify
3172// it under the terms of the GNU Affero General Public License as
3173// published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the
3174// License, or any later version(in your opinion).
3175//
3176// This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
3177// but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
3178// MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the
3179// GNU Affero General Public License for more details.
3180//
3181// You should have received a copy of the GNU Affero General Public License
3182// along with this program. If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.

3194 enum ContactType {
3195 MIRAI_CONTACT = 0,
3197 MIRAI_FRIEND = 1,
3199 MIRAI_GROUP = 2,
3201 MIRAI_MEMBER = 3,
3203 MIRAI_BOT = 4,
3204 MIRAI_OTHERTYPE = 5,
3205 };
3207 struct IContactData : public IMiraiData {
3209 std::string _nickOrNameCard;
3211 std::string _avatarUrl;
3213 QQID _id{};
3215 QQID _botId{};
3217 ContactType _type = MIRAI_CONTACT;
3218 void deserialize(nlohmann::json inJson) override;
3219 nlohmann::json internalToJson() const override;
3221 void refreshInfo() override;
3227 void updateJson(nlohmann::json &jsonToUpdate) const;
3228 };
3229 struct GroupRelatedData : public IContactData {
3230 typedef IContactData Super;
3232 QQID _groupId;
3233 nlohmann::json internalToJson() const override;
