3235 };
3240 class Contact {
3241 template<typename ClassType, typename InternalDataType>
3242 friend struct ContactDataHelper;
3243 // attrs
3244 protected:
3246 std::shared_ptr<IContactData> InternalData;
3247 public:
3252 Contact() = delete;
3253 protected:
3254 explicit Contact(std::shared_ptr<IContactData> Data) {
3255 SetInternalData(std::move(Data));
3256 }
3257 public:
3259 virtual ~Contact() = default;
3260 bool operator==(const Contact &c) const {
3261 return this->id() == c.id();
3262 }
3267 void SetInternalData(std::shared_ptr<IContactData> Data) { InternalData = std::move(Data); }
3273 void refreshInfo() {
3274 InternalData->requestRefresh();
3275 }
3281 void forceRefreshNextTime() {
3282 InternalData->forceRefreshNextTime();
3283 }
3289 void forceRefreshNow() {
3290 forceRefreshNextTime();
3291 refreshInfo();
3292 }
3301 ContactType type() const { return InternalData->_type; }
3310 QQID id() const { return InternalData->_id; }
3315 QQID botid() const { return InternalData->_botId; };
3326 template<typename T>
3327 MessageSource quoteAndSendMessage(const T &s, MessageSource ms) {
3328 return this->quoteAndSend1(s, ms);
3329 }
3340 template<typename... T>
3341 MessageSource quoteAndSendMessage(const MessageSource &ms, T &&...val) {
3342 return this->quoteAndSend1(MessageChain(std::forward<T>(val)...), ms);
3343 }
3354 template<typename... T>
3355 MessageSource sendMessage(T &&...msg) {
3356 return this->sendMessage(MessageChain(std::forward<T>(msg)...));
3357 }
3368 template<typename T>
3369 MessageSource sendMessage(T &&msg) {
3370 return this->unpackMsg(MessageChain(std::forward<T>(msg)));
3371 }
3372 private: // private methods
3373 MessageSource quoteAndSend0(std::string msg, const MessageSource &ms) const;
3374 MessageSource quoteAndSend1(const SingleMessage &s, const MessageSource &ms) {
3375 return this->quoteAndSend0(MessageChain(s).toString(), ms);
3376 }
3377 MessageSource quoteAndSend1(const std::string &s, const MessageSource &ms) {
3378 return this->quoteAndSend0(s, ms);
3379 }
3380 MessageSource quoteAndSend1(const MessageChain &mc, const MessageSource &ms) {
3381 return this->quoteAndSend0(mc.toString(), ms);
3382 }
3383 public: // serialization
3385 nlohmann::json toJson() const { return InternalData->toJson(); }
3387 void updateJson(nlohmann::json &j) const { InternalData->updateJson(j); }
3392 std::string toString() const {
3393 return toJson().dump();
3394 }
3397 static std::shared_ptr<Contact> deserializeToPointer(nlohmann::json source);
3398 // for derived class
3399 template<class T>
3400 static T deserialize(nlohmann::json source) {
3401 static_assert(std::is_base_of_v<Contact, T>, "Cannot deserialize class that isn't base on Contact");
3402 return T(std::move(source));
3403 }
3412 Image uploadImg(const std::string &path) const;
3413 FlashImage uploadFlashImg(const std::string &path) const;
3414 protected:
3416 MessageSource sendVoiceImpl(std::string path) const;
3419 MessageSource sendMsgImpl(std::string msg) const;
3420 MessageSource unpackMsg(const MessageChain &msg) const {
3421 return sendMsgImpl(msg.toString());
3422 }
3423 MessageSource unpackMsg(const MiraiCodeable &msg) const {
3424 return sendMsgImpl(MessageChain::deserializationFromMiraiCode(msg.toMiraiCode()).toString());
3425 }
3426 MessageSource unpackMsg(std::string msg) const {
3427 return sendMsgImpl(MessageChain(PlainText(std::move(msg))).toString());
3428 }
3429 MessageSource unpackMsg(const char *msg) const {
3430 return sendMsgImpl(MessageChain(PlainText(msg)).toString());
3431 }
3432 };
3435 template<typename ClassType, typename InternalDataType>
3436 struct ContactDataHelper {
3437 typedef InternalDataType DataType;
3438 protected:
3439 using json = nlohmann::json;
3446 DataType *GetDataInternal() const {
3447 auto clz_ptr = static_cast<const ClassType *>(this);
3448 assert(clz_ptr->InternalData != nullptr);
3449 return static_cast<DataType *>(clz_ptr->InternalData.get());
3450 }
3451 public:
3453 std::string nickOrNameCard() const {
3454 auto dataPtr = GetDataInternal();
3455 dataPtr->requestRefresh();
3456 std::shared_lock<std::shared_mutex> local_lck(dataPtr->getMutex());
3457 return dataPtr->_nickOrNameCard;
3458 };
3460 std::string avatarUrl() const {
3461 auto dataPtr = GetDataInternal();
3462 dataPtr->requestRefresh();
3463 std::shared_lock<std::shared_mutex> local_lck(dataPtr->getMutex());
3464 return dataPtr->_avatarUrl;
3465 };
3466 };

3881namespace MiraiCP {
3883 namespace eventTypes {
3884 enum Types {
3885 BaseEvent [[maybe_unused]] = -1,
3886 BotOnlineEvent, // 0
3887 BotJoinGroupEvent, // 1
3888 GroupInviteEvent, // 2
3889 BotLeaveEvent, // 3
3890 FriendMessageEvent, // 4
3891 GroupMessageEvent, // 5
3892 GroupTempMessageEvent, // 6
3893 FriendRecallEvent, // 7
3894 MemberRecallEvent, // 8
3895 MessagePreSendEvent, // 9
3896 NudgeEvent, // 10
3897 NewFriendRequestEvent, // 11
3898 MemberLeaveEvent, // 12
3899 MemberJoinEvent, // 13
3900 MemberJoinRequestEvent, // 14
3901 TimeOutEvent, // 15
3902 MiraiCPExceptionEvent = 16, // 16 todo 暂时保持
3903 Command = 17, // 17
3904 count, // 事件在此位置前定义，此时count为事件种类数
3905 error // 出现问题时使用此enum
3906 };
3907 }
3908 class BaseEventData {
3909 public:
3910 class BuiltInContact {
3911 public:
3912 enum ContactType{
3913 TypeFriend = 1, // 1
3914 TypeGroup, // 2
3915 TypeMember, // 3
3916 TypeBot, // 4
3917 TypeStranger, // 5
3918 TypeAnonymousMember // 6
3919 };
3920 QQID id{};
3921 QQID botId{};
3922 QQID groupId{};
3923 ContactType type{};
3924 explicit BuiltInContact(nlohmann::json in_json);
3925 std::shared_ptr<Contact> toContactPointer();
3926 };
3927 std::optional<BuiltInContact> subject = std::nullopt;
3928 std::optional<BuiltInContact> object = std::nullopt;
3929 QQID botId;
3930 nlohmann::json eventData;
3931 explicit BaseEventData(nlohmann::json j);
3932 };
3934 class MiraiCPEvent {
3935 public:
3936 MiraiCPEvent() = default;
3937 virtual ~MiraiCPEvent() = default;
3938 public:
3939 static eventTypes::Types get_event_type() { return eventTypes::Types::error; }
3940 virtual eventTypes::Types getEventType() const = 0;
3941 };
3943 template<class T>
3944 class BotEvent : public MiraiCPEvent {
3945 public:
3946 eventTypes::Types getEventType() const override { return T::get_event_type(); }
3948 Bot bot;
3951 IdLogger botlogger;
3952 explicit BotEvent(QQID botid) : bot(botid), botlogger(botid, &Logger::logger) {}
3953 virtual ~BotEvent() = default;
3954 };
3956 class IMessageEvent {
3957 public:
3959 virtual Contact *chat() = 0;
3961 virtual Contact *from() = 0;
3962 virtual MessageChain *getMessageChain() = 0;
3963 virtual const Contact *chat() const = 0;
3964 virtual const Contact *from() const = 0;
3965 virtual const MessageChain *getMessageChain() const = 0;
3966 };
3971 class GroupMessageEvent : public BotEvent<GroupMessageEvent>, public IMessageEvent {
3972 public:
3973 static eventTypes::Types get_event_type() {
3974 return eventTypes::Types::GroupMessageEvent;
3975 }
3976 public:
3978 Group group;
3980 Member sender;
3982 MessageChain message;
3983 // GroupMessageEvent(QQID botId, Group group, Member sender,
3984 // MessageChain mc) : BotEvent(botId), group(std::move(group)),
3985 // sender(std::move(sender)), message(std::move(mc)){};
3986 explicit GroupMessageEvent(BaseEventData j);
3993 MessageChain nextMessage(long time = -1, bool halt = true) const;
4000 MessageChain senderNextMessage(long time = -1, bool halt = true) const;
4001 public:
4002 Contact *chat() override {
4003 return &group;
4004 }
4005 const Contact *chat() const override {
4006 return &group;
4007 }
4008 Contact *from() override {
4009 return &sender;
4010 }
4011 const Contact *from() const override {
4012 return &sender;
4013 }
4014 MessageChain *getMessageChain() override {
4015 return &message;
4016 }
4017 const MessageChain *getMessageChain() const override {
4018 return &message;
4019 }
4020 };
4025 class PrivateMessageEvent : public BotEvent<PrivateMessageEvent>, public IMessageEvent {
4026 public:
4027 static eventTypes::Types get_event_type() {
4028 return eventTypes::Types::FriendMessageEvent;
4029 }
4030 public:
4032 Friend sender;
4034 MessageChain message{};
4042 explicit PrivateMessageEvent(BaseEventData j);
4050 MessageChain nextMessage(long time = -1, bool halt = true) const;
4051 public:
4052 Contact *chat() override {
4053 return &sender;
4054 }
4055 const Contact *chat() const override {
4056 return &sender;
4057 }
4058 Contact *from() override {
4059 return &sender;
4060 }
4061 const Contact *from() const override {
4062 return &sender;
4063 }
4064 MessageChain *getMessageChain() override {
4065 return &message;
4066 }
4067 const MessageChain *getMessageChain() const override {
4068 return &message;
4069 }
4070 };

4093 }

4358 class MemberJoinRequestEvent : public BotEvent<MemberJoinRequestEvent> {

4367 QQID botid,
4368 bool sign,

4413 class MiraiCPExceptionBase; // forward declaration
4415 class MiraiCPExceptionEvent : public MiraiCPEvent {
4416 private:
4417 MiraiCPExceptionBase *exceptionPtr;
4418 public:
4419 explicit MiraiCPExceptionEvent(MiraiCPExceptionBase *err) {
4420 exceptionPtr = err;
4421 }
4422 public:
4423 static eventTypes::Types get_event_type() {
4424 return eventTypes::Types::MiraiCPExceptionEvent;
4425 }
4426 eventTypes::Types getEventType() const override { return this->get_event_type(); }
4427 const MiraiCPExceptionBase *getException() const {
4428 return exceptionPtr;
4429 }
4430 };
4432 class NodeHandle {
4433 private:
4434 bool _enable;
4435 public:
4436 explicit NodeHandle(bool a) : _enable(a) {}
4437 bool isEnable() const { return _enable; }
4438 void stop() { _enable = false; }
4439 void resume() { _enable = true; }
4440 };
4441 class MIRAICP_EXPORT Event {
4442 private: // typedefs
4443 class eventNode {
4444 private:
4446 std::shared_ptr<NodeHandle> _handle;
4447 public:
4448 std::function<bool(MiraiCPEvent *)> func;
4449 public:
4450 eventNode() : _handle(), func(nullptr) {}
4451 explicit eventNode(std::function<bool(MiraiCPEvent *)> f) : _handle(new NodeHandle(true)), func(std::move(f)) {}
4452 eventNode(const eventNode &_o) = default; // for MSVC compatible, or you will get an error
4453 eventNode(eventNode &&_o) noexcept : _handle(std::move(_o._handle)), func(std::move(_o.func)) {}
4454 public:
4456 bool run(MiraiCPEvent *a) const {
4457 return _handle->isEnable() && func(a);
4458 }
4459 std::shared_ptr<NodeHandle> getHandle() {
4460 return _handle;
4461 }
4462 };
4463 using priority_level = unsigned char;
4464 using event_vector = std::vector<eventNode>;
4465 using eventNodeTable = std::vector<std::map<priority_level, event_vector>>;
4466 private: // member
4467 eventNodeTable _all_events_;
4468 private:
4469 Event() : _all_events_(int(eventTypes::Types::count)){};
4470 public: // singleton mode
4471 static Event processor;
4472 private:
4473 template<typename EventClass>
4474 constexpr static int id() {
4475 static_assert(std::is_base_of_v<MiraiCPEvent, EventClass>, "只支持广播继承MiraiCPEvent的事件");
4476 return static_cast<int>(EventClass::get_event_type());
4477 }
4478 public:
4479 static bool noRegistered(int index) {
4480 return processor._all_events_[index].empty();
4481 }
4483 static void clear() noexcept {
4484 for (auto &a: processor._all_events_) a.clear();
4485 }
4486 static void incomingEvent(BaseEventData j, int type);
4488 template<typename EventClass>
4489 static void broadcast(EventClass &&val) {
4490 static_assert(std::is_base_of_v<MiraiCPEvent, EventClass>, "只支持广播MiraiCPEvent的派生类");
4491 MiraiCPEvent *p = &val;
4492 for (auto &&[k, v]: processor._all_events_[id<EventClass>()]) {
4493 for (auto &&a: v) {
4494 if (a.run(p)) return;
4495 }
4496 }
4497 }
4505 template<typename EventClass>
4506 static std::shared_ptr<NodeHandle> registerEvent(std::function<void(EventClass)> callback, priority_level level = 100) {
4507 static_assert(std::is_base_of_v<MiraiCPEvent, EventClass>, "只支持注册MiraiCPEvent的派生类事件");
4508 std::function<bool(MiraiCPEvent *)> tmp = [=](MiraiCPEvent *p) {
4509 callback(*static_cast<EventClass *>(p));
4510 return false;
4511 };
4512 auto t = eventNode(tmp);
4513 auto ans = t.getHandle();
4514 // 先获得shared_ptr才可以emplace_back
4515 processor._all_events_[id<EventClass>()][level].emplace_back(std::move(t));
4516 return ans;
4517 }
4526 template<typename EventClass>
4527 static std::shared_ptr<NodeHandle> registerBlockingEvent(std::function<bool(EventClass)> callback, priority_level level = 100) {
4528 static_assert(std::is_base_of_v<MiraiCPEvent, EventClass>, "只支持注册MiraiCPEvent的派生类事件");
4529 std::function<bool(MiraiCPEvent *)> tmp = [=](MiraiCPEvent *p) {
4530 return callback(*static_cast<EventClass *>(p));
4531 };
4532 auto t = eventNode(tmp);
4533 auto ans = t.getHandle();
4534 // 先获得shared_ptr才可以emplace_back
4535 processor._all_events_[id<EventClass>()][level].emplace_back(std::move(t));
4536 return ans;
4537 }
4538 };
4539} // namespace MiraiCP
4540#endif //MIRAICP_PRO_EVENT_H
4541#ifndef MIRAICP_PRO_EXCEPTION_H
4542#define MIRAICP_PRO_EXCEPTION_H
4543// #include "MiraiCPMacros.h"
4544// -----------------------
4545// #include "CPPPlugin.h"
4546#include <exception>
4547#include <string>
4548#include <thread>
4549namespace MiraiCP {
4552 class MIRAICP_EXPORT MiraiCPExceptionBase : public ::std::exception {
4553 protected:
4554 using string = std::string;
4555 protected:
4557 string re;
4558 public:
4560 string filename;
4562 int lineNum = 0;
4563 protected:
4565 MiraiCPExceptionBase(string info, string _filename, int _lineNum) : re(std::move(info)), filename(std::move(_filename)), lineNum(_lineNum) {}
4566 public:
4567 ~MiraiCPExceptionBase() override = default;
4568 public:
4570 const char *what() const noexcept override { return re.c_str(); }
4572 string getError() const { return re; }
4574 void raise() const;
4575 public: // 暴露的接口
4577 virtual void basicRaise() const;
4578 // CRTP实现一次，调用静态的exceptionType
4580 virtual string getExceptionType() const = 0;
4581 // 每个子类需要单独实现该静态方法
4584 static string exceptionType() { return "MiraiCPException"; }
4585 };
4594 template<class T>
4595 class MIRAICP_EXPORT MiraiCPExceptionCRTP : public MiraiCPExceptionBase {
4596 public:
4598 explicit MiraiCPExceptionCRTP(string _re, string _filename, int _lineNum) : MiraiCPExceptionBase(std::move(_re), std::move(_filename), _lineNum) {
4599 }
4600 public:
4601 // CRTP类型获取实现
4602 string getExceptionType() const override { return T::exceptionType(); }
4603 };
4607 class MIRAICP_EXPORT MiraiCPException : public MiraiCPExceptionCRTP<MiraiCPExceptionBase> {};
4610 class MIRAICP_EXPORT UploadException : public MiraiCPExceptionCRTP<UploadException> {
4611 public:
4612 explicit UploadException(const std::string &text, string _filename, int _lineNum) : MiraiCPExceptionCRTP("上传(图片/文件)异常" + text, std::move(_filename), _lineNum) {}
4613 static std::string exceptionType() { return "UploadException"; }
4614 };

4621 };

4653 * 禁言时间超出0s~30d
4654 */

4660 class MIRAICP_EXPORT MemberException : public MiraiCPExceptionCRTP<MemberException> {
4661 public:
4662 enum MemberExceptionType : int {
4663 OtherType,
4664 NoSuchGroup,
4665 NoSuchMember
4666 };
4667 MemberExceptionType type = OtherType;
4668 /*
4669 * "1" - 找不到群
4670 * "2" - 找不到群成员
4671 */
4672 explicit MemberException(int _type, string _filename, int _lineNum) : MiraiCPExceptionCRTP(
4673 [&]() -> string {
4674 type = MemberExceptionType(_type);
4675 switch (type) {
4676 case NoSuchGroup:
4677 return "找不到群";
4678 case NoSuchMember:
4679 return "找不到群成员";
4680 default:
4681 return "";
4682 }
4683 }(),
4684 std::move(_filename), _lineNum) {}
4685 static string exceptionType() { return "MemberException"; }
4686 };

4690 public:
4691 /*
4692 * 找不到好友
4693 */
4694 FriendException(string _filename, int _lineNum) : MiraiCPExceptionCRTP("找不到好友", std::move(_filename), _lineNum) {}
4695 static string exceptionType() { return "FriendException"; }
4696 };

4760 class MiraiCPThreadException : public MiraiCPExceptionCRTP<MiraiCPThreadException> {
4761 public:
4763 std::thread::id threadId;
4764 public:
4765 explicit MiraiCPThreadException(const std::string &exception_content, std::thread::id threadId, string _filename, int _lineNum)
4766 : MiraiCPExceptionCRTP(exception_content + " at threadId: " + getThreadIdStr(threadId), std::move(_filename), _lineNum),
4767 threadId(threadId) {}
4768 public:
4769 std::string getThreadIdStr() const { return getThreadIdStr(threadId); }
4770 public:
4771 static string exceptionType() { return "MiraiCPThreadException"; }
4772 private:
4773 MIRAICP_EXPORT static std::string getThreadIdStr(const std::thread::id &id);
4774 };
4775 void ErrorHandle0(const std::string &name, int line, const std::string &re, const std::string &ErrorMsg = "");
4776} // namespace MiraiCP
4777#endif //MIRAICP_PRO_EXCEPTION_H
4778#ifndef MIRAICP_PRO_FORWARDEDMESSAGE_H
4779#define MIRAICP_PRO_FORWARDEDMESSAGE_H
4780// #include "MessageChain.h"
4781#include <utility>
4782#include <variant>
4783namespace MiraiCP {
4784 class Contact;
4785 class ForwardedMessage;
4787 class ForwardedMessageDisplayStrategy {
4788 using string = std::string;
4789 public:
4790 string title = "群聊的聊天记录";
4791 string brief = "[聊天记录]";
4792 string source = "聊天记录";
4793 string summary = "查看1条转发信息";
4794 std::vector<string> preview{"Name: message"};
4795 bool operator==(const ForwardedMessageDisplayStrategy& other) const;
4796 public:
4797 static ForwardedMessageDisplayStrategy defaultStrategy() { return {}; }
4798 public:
4799 ForwardedMessageDisplayStrategy() = default;
4800 ForwardedMessageDisplayStrategy(std::string title, std::string brief, std::string source, std::string summary, std::vector<std::string> preview) : title(std::move(title)), brief(std::move(brief)), source(std::move(source)), summary(std::move(summary)), preview(std::move(preview)) {}
4801 public:
4802 nlohmann::json toJson() const{
4803 nlohmann::json j;
4804 j["title"] = title;
4805 j["brief"] = brief;
4806 j["source"] = source;
4807 j["summary"] = summary;
4808 j["preview"] = preview;
4809 return j;
4810 }
4811 static ForwardedMessageDisplayStrategy fromJson(const nlohmann::json& j){
4812 return {j["title"], j["brief"], j["source"], j["summary"], j["preview"].get<std::vector<std::string>>()};
4813 }
4814 };
4817 class ForwardedNode {
4818 public:
4820 QQID id = 0;
4822 std::string name;
4824 MessageChain message;
4826 int time = 0;
4827 private:
4828 bool isForwardedMessage;
4829 public:
4835 ForwardedNode(QQID id, std::string name, MessageChain message,
4836 int time)
4837 : id(id), name(std::move(name)), message(std::move(message)), time(time), isForwardedMessage(false) {}
4842 ForwardedNode(QQID id, std::string name, ForwardedMessage message, int t);
4843 public:
4844 bool isForwarded() const { return isForwardedMessage; }
4845 };
4850 class ForwardedMessage: public SingleMessage {
4851 private:
4853 std::vector<ForwardedNode> nodes;
4855 ForwardedMessageDisplayStrategy display;
4856 public:
4857 ForwardedNode &operator[](int i) {
4858 return nodes[i];
4859 }
4860 const ForwardedNode &operator[](int i) const {
4861 return nodes[i];
4862 }
4863 void add(ForwardedNode &&a) { this->nodes.emplace_back(std::move(a)); }
4864 void add(const ForwardedNode &a) { this->nodes.push_back(a); }
4865 auto &operator+=(const ForwardedNode &a) {
4866 this->add(a);
4867 return *this;
4868 }
4869 auto &operator+=(ForwardedNode &&a) {
4870 this->add(std::move(a));
4871 return *this;
4872 }
4873 bool operator==(const ForwardedMessage &m) const;
4874 public:
4879 ForwardedMessage(std::initializer_list<ForwardedNode> nodes, ForwardedMessageDisplayStrategy display = ForwardedMessageDisplayStrategy::defaultStrategy())
4880 : nodes(std::vector(nodes)), display(std::move(display)) {}
4881 explicit ForwardedMessage(std::vector<ForwardedNode> inNodes, ForwardedMessageDisplayStrategy display = ForwardedMessageDisplayStrategy::defaultStrategy())
4882 : nodes(std::move(inNodes)), display(std::move(display)) {}
4883 ForwardedMessage(const ForwardedMessage &) = default;
4884 ForwardedMessage(ForwardedMessage &&) = default;
4885 nlohmann::json toJson() const override;
4886 public:
4888 MessageSource sendTo(Contact *c) const;
4889 nlohmann::json nodesToJson() const;
4890 public:
4891 static ForwardedMessage deserializationFromMessageJson(const nlohmann::json &j);
4892 };
4895 using OnlineForwardedMessage = ForwardedMessage;
4896} // namespace MiraiCP
4897#endif //MIRAICP_PRO_FORWARDEDMESSAGE_H

4983 // requireConfirm(
4984 // requireConfirm),

5142#ifndef MIRAICP_PRO_IMIRAIDATA_H
5143#define MIRAICP_PRO_IMIRAIDATA_H
5144#include "json_fwd.hpp"
5145#include <atomic>
5146#include <shared_mutex>
5147namespace MiraiCP {
5149 struct IMiraiData {
5150 private:
5152 struct MiraiDataLocker final {
5154 std::shared_mutex _mtx;
5156 std::atomic<bool> _inited = false;
5157 };
5158 protected:
5160 mutable MiraiDataLocker Locker;
5161 public:
5162 IMiraiData() = default;
5163 virtual ~IMiraiData() = default;
5164 public:
5166 nlohmann::json toJson() const;
5167 protected:
5169 virtual void deserialize(nlohmann::json in_json) = 0;
5171 virtual nlohmann::json internalToJson() const = 0;
5176 nlohmann::json internalToString() const;
5177 public:
5179 void requestRefresh();
5185 void forceRefreshNextTime();
5187 std::string toString() const;
5189 std::shared_mutex &getMutex() {
5190 return Locker._mtx;
5191 }
5192 private:
5194 virtual void refreshInfo() = 0;
5195 };
5196} // namespace MiraiCP
5197#endif //MIRAICP_PRO_IMIRAIDATA_H

5287 Publish, // 2

5298 bool catchErr = true,
5299 const std::string &errorInfo = "");

5313#ifndef MIRAICP_PRO_LOGGER_H
5314#define MIRAICP_PRO_LOGGER_H
5315// #include "MiraiCode.h"
5316// #include "commonTypes.h"
5317#include <functional>
5318#include <sstream>
5319namespace MiraiCP {
5320 class MiraiCodeable; // forward declaration
5332 class Logger_interface {
5333 using string = std::string;
5334 public:
5341 typedef std::function<void(string, int)> Action;
5343 struct Handler {
5345 bool enable = true;
5347 Action action;
5348 };
5349 std::shared_ptr<Handler> loggerhandler;
5350 private:
5351 static std::string constructString() {
5352 return "";
5353 }
5354 template<class T, class... T1>
5355 static std::string constructString(T &&val, T1 &&...val1) {
5356 // todo(Antares): 构造一个std::stringstream消耗很大，改为T类型实现序列化函数，
5357 // 调用 T::serialize
5358 std::stringstream sstream;
5359 sstream << val;
5360 return sstream.str() + constructString(std::forward<T1>(val1)...);
5361 }
5362 template<class... T>
5363 static std::string constructString(const std::string &a, T &&...val1) {
5364 return a + constructString(std::forward<T>(val1)...);
5365 }
5366 template<class... T>
5367 static std::string constructString(const MiraiCodeable &val, T &&...val1) {
5368 return val.toMiraiCode() + constructString(std::forward<T>(val1)...);
5369 }
5370 void create_loggerhandler() {
5371 loggerhandler.reset(new Handler);
5372 }
5373 protected:
5377 virtual void log_interface(const string &log, int level) = 0;
5378 void handler_trigger(string log, int level) {
5379 if (!loggerhandler) create_loggerhandler();
5380 if (loggerhandler->enable && loggerhandler->action) loggerhandler->action(std::move(log), level);
5381 }
5382 public:
5384 template<class... T>
5385 void info(T &&...val) {
5386 this->log_interface(constructString(std::forward<T>(val)...), 0);
5387 }
5389 template<class... T>
5390 void warning(T &&...val) {
5391 this->log_interface(constructString(std::forward<T>(val)...), 1);
5392 }
5394 template<class... T>
5395 void error(T &&...val) {
5396 this->log_interface(constructString(std::forward<T>(val)...), 2);
5397 }
5401 void registerHandle(Action action) {
5402 if (!this->loggerhandler) create_loggerhandler();
5403 this->loggerhandler->action = std::move(action);
5404 }
5408 void setHandleState(bool state) {
5409 if (!this->loggerhandler) create_loggerhandler();
5410 this->loggerhandler->enable = state;
5411 }
5412 };
5413 class MIRAICP_EXPORT Logger : public Logger_interface {
5414 private:
5415 Logger() = default;
5416 protected:
5420 void log_interface(const std::string &content, int level) override;
5421 public:
5422 static Logger logger;
5423 };
5425 class IdLogger : public Logger_interface {
5426 public:
5427 QQID id;
5428 public:
5429 IdLogger(QQID id, Logger *l) : id(id) {
5430 this->loggerhandler = l->loggerhandler;
5431 }
5432 protected:
5433 void log_interface(const std::string &content, int level) override;
5434 };
5435} // namespace MiraiCP
5436#endif //MIRAICP_PRO_LOGGER_H
5437#ifndef MIRAICP_PRO_LOWLEVELAPI_H
5438#define MIRAICP_PRO_LOWLEVELAPI_H
5439#include <json_fwd.hpp>
5440namespace MiraiCP {
5442 class LowLevelAPI {
5443 public:
5447 static std::string getInfoSource(nlohmann::json c);
5454 static std::string uploadImg0(std::string, nlohmann::json);
5456 struct info {
5457 std::string nickOrNameCard;
5458 std::string avatarUrl;
5459 };
5462 static info info0(const std::string &source);
5463 };
5465 bool checkSafeCall();
5466} // namespace MiraiCP
5467#endif //MIRAICP_PRO_LOWLEVELAPI_H

5473// License, or any later version(in your opinion).

5483#ifndef MIRAICP_PRO_MEMBER_H
5484#define MIRAICP_PRO_MEMBER_H

5490 struct MemberData : public GroupRelatedData {
5491 typedef IContactData Super;
5496 unsigned int _permission = 0;
5498 bool _anonymous = false;

5501 void refreshInfo() override;
5502 };
5507 class Member : public Contact, public INudgeSupport, public ContactDataHelper<Member, MemberData> {
5508 friend class Contact;
5509 public:
5513 explicit Member(nlohmann::json in_json);
5518 explicit Member(QQID qqid, QQID groupid, QQID botid);
5520 Member(bool) = delete;
5522 DECL_GETTER(anonymous)
5523 DECL_GETTER(permission)
5524 INLINE_GETTER(groupId)
5525 public:
5529 void modifyAdmin(bool admin);
5531 MessageSource sendVoice(std::string path) {
5532 return sendVoiceImpl(std::move(path));
5533 }
5538 void mute(long long sec) const;
5543 void mute(std::chrono::seconds time) const {
5544 mute(time.count());
5545 }
5548 void unMute() const {
5549 mute(0);
5550 }
5554 void kick(std::string reason);
5556 At at() { return At(this->id()); }
5559 void changeNameCard(std::string_view newName);
5565 void sendNudge() override;
5566 };
5567} // namespace MiraiCP
5568#endif //MIRAICP_PRO_MEMBER_H

5572// it under the terms of the GNU Affero General Public License as
5573// published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the
5574// License, or any later version(in your opinion).

5577// but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
5578// MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the

5584#ifndef MIRAICP_PRO_MESSAGECHAIN_H
5585#define MIRAICP_PRO_MESSAGECHAIN_H
5586// #include "MiraiCPMacros.h"
5587// -----------------------
5588// #include "Exception.h"
5589// #include "SingleMessage.h"
5590// #include "commonTools.h"
5591namespace MiraiCP {
5592 class MessageSource; // forward declaration
5593 namespace internal {
5596 class Message : public std::shared_ptr<SingleMessage> {
5597 typedef std::shared_ptr<SingleMessage> Super;
5598 public:
5599#if MIRAICP_MSVC
5600 Message() {} // for MSVC compatible, Message should be default constructable. See MessageChain
5601#endif
5602 template<typename T, typename = std::enable_if<std::is_base_of_v<SingleMessage, T>>>
5603 explicit Message(T msg) {
5604 reset(new T(std::move(msg)));
5605 }
5606 explicit Message(Super msgptr) noexcept : Super(std::move(msgptr)) {}
5607 // dev: DON'T write copy and move constructors here, otherwise add operator= overloads. See MessageChain
5608 public:
5611 [[nodiscard]] int getType() const {
5612 return (*this)->internalType;
5613 };
5616 template<class T>
5617 T getVal() const {
5618 // for dev: 不用 get 为了不和shared_ptr重叠
5619 static_assert(std::is_base_of_v<SingleMessage, T>, "只支持SingleMessage的派生类");
5620 if (T::type() != getType())
5621 throw IllegalArgumentException(
5622 "cannot convert from " + SingleMessage::getTypeString(getType()) + " to " +
5623 SingleMessage::getTypeString(T::type()),
5624 MIRAICP_EXCEPTION_WHERE);
5625 T *re = static_cast<T *>(std::shared_ptr<SingleMessage>::get());
5626 if (re == nullptr)
5627 throw IllegalArgumentException(
5628 "cannot convert from " + SingleMessage::getTypeString(getType()) + " to " +
5629 SingleMessage::getTypeString(T::type()),
5630 MIRAICP_EXCEPTION_WHERE);
5631 return *re;
5632 }
5633 [[nodiscard]] std::string toMiraiCode() const {
5634 return (*this)->toMiraiCode();
5635 }
5636 [[nodiscard]] std::string toJson() const {
5637 return (*this)->toJson();
5638 }
5639 bool operator==(const Message &m) const {
5640 return (*this)->internalType == m->internalType && (*this)->toMiraiCode() == m->toMiraiCode();
5641 }
5642 bool operator!=(const Message &m) const {
5643 return (*this)->internalType != m->internalType || (*this)->toMiraiCode() != m->toMiraiCode();
5644 }
5645 };
5646 } // namespace internal
5648 class MIRAICP_EXPORT MessageChain : public std::vector<internal::Message>, public MiraiCodeable {
5649 public: // typedefs
5650 using Message = internal::Message;
5651 public:
5653 std::optional<MessageSource> source = std::nullopt;
5654 public:
5655 MessageChain(const MessageChain &_o) = default;
5656 MessageChain(MessageChain &&_o) = default;
5657 MessageChain() = default;
5658 ~MessageChain() override = default;
5667 template<typename... T, typename = std::enable_if_t<!std::is_same_v<std::decay_t<T>..., MessageChain>>>
5668 explicit MessageChain(T &&...args) {
5669 constructMessages(std::forward<T>(args)...);
5670 };
5672 template<class... T>
5673 explicit MessageChain(MessageSource ms, T &&...args) : source(std::move(ms)) {
5674 this->constructMessages(std::forward<T>(args)...);
5675 };
5676 public:
5677 [[deprecated("MessageChain继承自std::vector<Message>，无需获取内部vector")]] const std::vector<Message> &vector() const {
5678 return static_cast<const std::vector<Message> &>(*this);
5679 }
5680 std::string toMiraiCode() const override;
5681 std::vector<std::string> toMiraiCodeVector() const {
5682 std::vector<std::string> tmp;
5683 for (auto &&a: *this)
5684 tmp.emplace_back(a->toMiraiCode());
5685 return tmp;
5686 }
5687 nlohmann::json toJson() const;
5692 std::string toString() const;
5696 template<class T>
5697 void add(const T &a) {
5698 static_assert(std::is_base_of_v<SingleMessage, T>, "只接受SingleMessage的子类");
5699 emplace_back(a);
5700 }
5701 void add(const MessageSource &val) {
5702 source = val;
5703 }
5705 template<class T>
5706 std::vector<T> filter() {
5707 static_assert(std::is_base_of_v<SingleMessage, T>, "只支持SingleMessage的子类");
5708 std::vector<T> re;
5709 for (auto &&a: *this) {
5710 if (a.getType() == T::type())
5711 re.emplace_back(a.getVal<T>());
5712 }
5713 return re;
5714 }
5716 template<class T>
5717 std::vector<T> filter(const std::function<bool(const Message &)> &func) {
5718 static_assert(std::is_base_of_v<SingleMessage, T>, "只支持SingleMessage的子类");
5719 std::vector<T> re;
5720 for (auto &&a: *this) {
5721 if (func(a))
5722 re.push_back(a.getVal<T>());
5723 }
5724 return re;
5725 }
5727 template<class T>
5728 std::optional<T> first() {
5729 for (auto &&a: *this)
5730 if (a.getType() == T::type())
5731 return a.getVal<T>();
5732 return std::nullopt;
5733 }
5734 template<class T>
5735 [[nodiscard]] MessageChain plus(const T &a) const {
5736 static_assert(std::is_base_of_v<SingleMessage, T>, "只支持SingleMessage的子类");
5737 MessageChain tmp(*this);
5738 tmp.emplace_back(a);
5739 return tmp;
5740 }
5741 [[nodiscard]] MessageChain plus(const MessageChain &mc) const {
5742 MessageChain tmp(*this);
5743 tmp.insert(tmp.end(), mc.begin(), mc.end());
5744 return tmp;
5745 }
5746 [[nodiscard]] MessageChain plus(const MessageSource &ms) const {
5747 MessageChain tmp(*this);
5748 tmp.source = ms;
5749 return tmp;
5750 }
5751 template<class T>
5752 MessageChain operator+(const T &msg) const {
5753 return this->plus(msg);
5754 }
5755 bool operator==(const MessageChain &mc) const {
5756 if (size() != mc.size())
5757 return false;
5758 for (size_t i = 0; i < size(); i++) {
5759 if ((*this)[i] != mc[i])
5760 return false;
5761 }
5762 return true;
5763 }
5764 bool operator!=(const MessageChain &mc) const {
5765 return !(*this == mc);
5766 }
5767 bool empty() const {
5768 return std::vector<Message>::empty() || toMiraiCode().empty();
5769 }
5779 template<class T>
5780 ShouldNotUse("use Contact.quoteAndSend") MessageSource
5781 quoteAndSendMessage(T s, QQID groupid = -1, void *env = nullptr) = delete;
5782 public: // static functions
5787 static size_t findEnd(const std::string &s, size_t start) {
5788 size_t pos = start;
5789 while (pos < s.length()) {
5790 switch (s[pos]) {
5791 case '\\':
5792 pos += 2;
5793 continue;
5794 case ']':
5795 return pos;
5796 }
5797 pos++;
5798 }
5799 return -1;
5800 }
5802 static MessageChain deserializationFromMiraiCode(const std::string &m);
5803 static MessageChain deserializationFromMessageSourceJson(const std::string &msg, bool origin = true) {
5804 return deserializationFromMessageSourceJson(nlohmann::json::parse(msg), origin);
5805 }
5808 static MessageChain deserializationFromMessageSourceJson(nlohmann::json j, bool origin = true);
5811 static MessageChain deserializationFromMessageJson(const nlohmann::json &j);
5812 private: // private methods
5813 void constructMessages() {}
5814 template<class T1, class... T2>
5815 void constructMessages(T1 &&h, T2 &&...args) {
5816 static_assert(std::is_base_of_v<SingleMessage, typename std::decay_t<T1>>,
5817 "只支持SingleMessage子类");
5818 emplace_back(std::forward<T1>(h));
5819 constructMessages(std::forward<T2>(args)...);
5820 }
5821 template<class... T2>
5822 void constructMessages(const std::string &h, T2 &&...args) {
5823 emplace_back(PlainText(h));
5824 constructMessages(std::forward<T2>(args)...);
5825 }
5826 template<class... T2>
5827 void constructMessages(const char *h, T2 &&...args) {
5828 emplace_back(PlainText(h));
5829 constructMessages(std::forward<T2>(args)...);
5830 }
5831 template<class... T>
5832 void constructMessages(const MessageChain &mc, T &&...args) {
5833 insert(end(), mc.begin(), mc.end());
5834 constructMessages(std::forward<T>(args)...);
5835 }
5836 };
5837} // namespace MiraiCP
5838#endif //MIRAICP_PRO_MESSAGECHAIN_H
5839#ifndef MIRAICP_PRO_MESSAGESOURCE_H
5840#define MIRAICP_PRO_MESSAGESOURCE_H
5841// #include "MiraiCPMacros.h"
5842// -----------------------
5843// #include "commonTypes.h"
5844#include <string>
5845namespace MiraiCP {
5846 class MiraiCodeable; // forward declaration
5850 class MessageSource {
5851 public:
5853 std::string ids;
5855 std::string internalids;
5857 std::string source;
5858 MessageSource() = default;
5860 ShouldNotUse("Use Contact.quoteAndSendMessage") MessageSource
5861 quoteAndSendMiraiCode(MiraiCodeable *msg, QQID groupid = 0,
5862 void *env = nullptr) const = delete;
5864 ShouldNotUse("Use Contact.quoteAndSendMessage") MessageSource
5865 quoteAndSendMsg(const std::string &c, QQID groupid = 0,
5866 void * = nullptr) const = delete;
5868 ShouldNotUse("Use Contact.quoteAndSendMessage") MessageSource
5869 quoteAndSendMiraiCode(const std::string &c, QQID groupid = 0,
5870 void * = nullptr) const = delete;
5877 MessageSource(std::string ids, std::string internalids, std::string source);
5885 static MessageSource deserializeFromString(const std::string &source);
5886 std::string serializeToString() const;
5888 void recall() const;
5889 bool operator==(const MessageSource &ms) const {
5890 return this->ids == ms.ids && this->internalids == ms.internalids;
5891 }
5892 };
5893} // namespace MiraiCP
5894#endif //MIRAICP_PRO_MESSAGESOURCE_H

5899// published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the

5931#ifndef MIRAICP_PRO_EVENT_H
5932#define MIRAICP_PRO_EVENT_H
5933// #include "Bot.h"
5934// #include "Friend.h"
5935// #include "Group.h"
5936// #include "Logger.h"
5937// #include "Member.h"
5938#include <utility>
5939namespace MiraiCP {
5941 namespace eventTypes {
5942 enum Types {
5943 BaseEvent [[maybe_unused]] = -1,
5944 BotOnlineEvent, // 0
5945 BotJoinGroupEvent, // 1
5946 GroupInviteEvent, // 2
5947 BotLeaveEvent, // 3
5948 FriendMessageEvent, // 4
5949 GroupMessageEvent, // 5
5950 GroupTempMessageEvent, // 6
5951 FriendRecallEvent, // 7
5952 MemberRecallEvent, // 8
5953 MessagePreSendEvent, // 9
5954 NudgeEvent, // 10
5955 NewFriendRequestEvent, // 11
5956 MemberLeaveEvent, // 12
5957 MemberJoinEvent, // 13
5958 MemberJoinRequestEvent, // 14
5959 TimeOutEvent, // 15
5960 MiraiCPExceptionEvent = 16, // 16 todo 暂时保持
5961 Command = 17, // 17
5962 count, // 事件在此位置前定义，此时count为事件种类数
5963 error // 出现问题时使用此enum
5964 };
5965 }
5966 class BaseEventData {
5967 public:
5968 class BuiltInContact {
5969 public:
5970 enum ContactType{
5971 TypeFriend = 1, // 1
5972 TypeGroup, // 2
5973 TypeMember, // 3
5974 TypeBot, // 4
5975 TypeStranger, // 5
5976 TypeAnonymousMember // 6
5977 };
5978 QQID id{};
5979 QQID botId{};
5980 QQID groupId{};
5981 ContactType type{};
5982 explicit BuiltInContact(nlohmann::json in_json);
5983 std::shared_ptr<Contact> toContactPointer();
5984 };
5985 std::optional<BuiltInContact> subject = std::nullopt;
5986 std::optional<BuiltInContact> object = std::nullopt;
5987 QQID botId;
5988 nlohmann::json eventData;
5989 explicit BaseEventData(nlohmann::json j);
5990 };
5992 class MiraiCPEvent {
5993 public:
5994 MiraiCPEvent() = default;
5995 virtual ~MiraiCPEvent() = default;
5996 public:
5997 static eventTypes::Types get_event_type() { return eventTypes::Types::error; }
5998 virtual eventTypes::Types getEventType() const = 0;
5999 };
6001 template<class T>
6002 class BotEvent : public MiraiCPEvent {
6003 public:
6004 eventTypes::Types getEventType() const override { return T::get_event_type(); }
6006 Bot bot;
6009 IdLogger botlogger;
6010 explicit BotEvent(QQID botid) : bot(botid), botlogger(botid, &Logger::logger) {}
6011 virtual ~BotEvent() = default;
6012 };
6014 class IMessageEvent {
6015 public:
6017 virtual Contact *chat() = 0;
6019 virtual Contact *from() = 0;
6020 virtual MessageChain *getMessageChain() = 0;
6021 virtual const Contact *chat() const = 0;
6022 virtual const Contact *from() const = 0;
6023 virtual const MessageChain *getMessageChain() const = 0;
6024 };
6029 class GroupMessageEvent : public BotEvent<GroupMessageEvent>, public IMessageEvent {
6030 public:
6031 static eventTypes::Types get_event_type() {
6032 return eventTypes::Types::GroupMessageEvent;
6033 }
6034 public:
6036 Group group;
6038 Member sender;
6040 MessageChain message;
6041 // GroupMessageEvent(QQID botId, Group group, Member sender,
6042 // MessageChain mc) : BotEvent(botId), group(std::move(group)),
6043 // sender(std::move(sender)), message(std::move(mc)){};
6044 explicit GroupMessageEvent(BaseEventData j);
6051 MessageChain nextMessage(long time = -1, bool halt = true) const;
6058 MessageChain senderNextMessage(long time = -1, bool halt = true) const;
6059 public:
6060 Contact *chat() override {
6061 return &group;
6062 }
6063 const Contact *chat() const override {
6064 return &group;
6065 }
6066 Contact *from() override {
6067 return &sender;
6068 }
6069 const Contact *from() const override {
6070 return &sender;
6071 }
6072 MessageChain *getMessageChain() override {
6073 return &message;
6074 }
6075 const MessageChain *getMessageChain() const override {
6076 return &message;
6077 }
6078 };
6083 class PrivateMessageEvent : public BotEvent<PrivateMessageEvent>, public IMessageEvent {
6084 public:
6085 static eventTypes::Types get_event_type() {
6086 return eventTypes::Types::FriendMessageEvent;
6087 }
6088 public:
6090 Friend sender;
6092 MessageChain message{};
6100 explicit PrivateMessageEvent(BaseEventData j);
6108 MessageChain nextMessage(long time = -1, bool halt = true) const;
6109 public:
6110 Contact *chat() override {
6111 return &sender;
6112 }
6113 const Contact *chat() const override {
6114 return &sender;
6115 }
6116 Contact *from() override {
6117 return &sender;
6118 }
6119 const Contact *from() const override {
6120 return &sender;
6121 }
6122 MessageChain *getMessageChain() override {
6123 return &message;
6124 }
6125 const MessageChain *getMessageChain() const override {
6126 return &message;
6127 }
6128 };
6130 class GroupInviteEvent : public BotEvent<GroupInviteEvent> {
6131 public:
6132 static eventTypes::Types get_event_type() {
6133 return eventTypes::Types::GroupInviteEvent;
6134 }
6135 public:
6137 std::string source;
6139 std::string inviterNick;
6141 std::string groupName;
6143 Group group;
6145 Friend inviter;
6147 long requestEventId = 0;
6148 static void operation0(const std::string &source, QQID botid, bool accept);
6149 void reject() {
6150 GroupInviteEvent::operation0(this->source, this->bot.id(), false);
6151 }
6152 void accept() {
6153 GroupInviteEvent::operation0(this->source, this->bot.id(), true);
6154 }
6155 explicit GroupInviteEvent(BaseEventData j);
6156 };

6159 public:
6160 static eventTypes::Types get_event_type() {
6161 return eventTypes::Types::NewFriendRequestEvent;
6162 }
6163 public:
6165 std::string source;
6167 Friend from;
6169 std::optional<Group> fromGroup;
6171 std::string nick;
6173 std::string message;
6175 unsigned long long int requestEventId;
6178 static void operation0(const std::string &source, QQID botId, bool accept, bool ban = false);
6181 void reject(bool ban = false) {
6182 NewFriendRequestEvent::operation0(this->source, this->bot.id(), false, ban);
6183 }
6185 void accept() {
6186 NewFriendRequestEvent::operation0(this->source, this->bot.id(), true);
6187 }
6188 explicit NewFriendRequestEvent(BaseEventData j);
6189 };

6200 applied = 2,
6201 rehab = 3
6202 };
6209 joinType type = joinType::error;
6211 Member member;
6213 Group group;
6215 std::optional<Member> inviter;
6224 // MemberJoinEvent(QQID botId, int type, const Member &member, const Group &group,
6225 // QQID inviterid) : BotEvent(botId), type(joinType(type)), member(member),
6226 // group(group),
6227 // inviterid(inviterid) {}

6229 };

6250 };

6327 }

6330 }

6332 return &sender;
6333 }

6338 return &message;
6339 }

6341 return &message;
6342 }
6343 };
6345 class TimeOutEvent : public MiraiCPEvent {
6346 public:
6348 std::string msg;
6349 public:
6350 explicit TimeOutEvent(std::string msg) : msg(std::move(msg)) {}
6351 public:
6352 static eventTypes::Types get_event_type() {
6353 return eventTypes::Types::TimeOutEvent;
6354 }
6355 eventTypes::Types getEventType() const override { return this->get_event_type(); }
6356 };
6358 class BotOnlineEvent : public BotEvent<BotOnlineEvent> {
6359 public:
6360 static eventTypes::Types get_event_type() {
6361 return eventTypes::Types::BotOnlineEvent;
6362 }
6363 public:
6364 explicit BotOnlineEvent(QQID botid) : BotEvent(botid) {}
6365 };
6369 class NudgeEvent : public BotEvent<NudgeEvent> {
6370 public:
6371 static eventTypes::Types get_event_type() {
6372 return eventTypes::Types::NudgeEvent;
6373 }
6374 public:
6376 std::shared_ptr<Contact> from;
6378 std::shared_ptr<Contact> target;
6380 std::shared_ptr<Contact> subject;
6381 explicit NudgeEvent(BaseEventData j);
6382 };
6386 class BotLeaveEvent : public BotEvent<BotLeaveEvent> {
6387 public:
6388 static eventTypes::Types get_event_type() {
6389 return eventTypes::Types::BotLeaveEvent;
6390 }
6392 enum class EventType {
6394 Active = 0,
6396 Kick,
6398 Disband
6399 };
6400 public:
6403 Group group;
6404 EventType type;
6405 Member operater;
6406 // BotLeaveEvent(QQID ingroupid, QQID botId, int type, QQID operatorId)
6407 // : BotEvent(botId),
6408 // groupId(ingroupid), type(static_cast<EventType>(type)) {
6409 // if (operatorId != -1) {
6410 // this->operatorId = operatorId;
6411 // }
6412 // }
6413 explicit BotLeaveEvent(BaseEventData j);
6414 };
6416 class MemberJoinRequestEvent : public BotEvent<MemberJoinRequestEvent> {
6417 private:
6418 std::string source;
6419 public:
6424 static void operate(std::string_view s,
6425 QQID botid,
6426 bool sign,
6427 const std::string &msg = "");
6428 public:
6429 static eventTypes::Types get_event_type() {
6430 return eventTypes::Types::MemberJoinRequestEvent;
6431 }
6432 public:
6434 Group group;
6436 std::optional<Member> inviter;
6438 Member from;
6440 std::string fromNick;
6442 std::string message;
6443 public:
6444 explicit MemberJoinRequestEvent(BaseEventData j);
6446 void accept() {
6447 operate(this->source, this->bot.id(), true);
6448 }
6450 void reject(const std::string &msg) {
6451 operate(this->source, this->bot.id(), false, msg);
6452 }
6453 };
6458 class MessagePreSendEvent : public BotEvent<MessagePreSendEvent> {
6459 public:
6460 static eventTypes::Types get_event_type() {
6461 return eventTypes::Types::MessagePreSendEvent;
6462 }
6463 public:
6465 std::shared_ptr<Contact> target;
6467 MessageChain message;
6468 //MessagePreSendEvent(std::shared_ptr<Contact> c, MessageChain mc, QQID botId) : BotEvent(botId), target(std::move(c)), message(std::move(mc)) {}
6469 explicit MessagePreSendEvent(BaseEventData j);
6470 };
6471 class MiraiCPExceptionBase; // forward declaration
6473 class MiraiCPExceptionEvent : public MiraiCPEvent {
6474 private:
6475 MiraiCPExceptionBase *exceptionPtr;
6476 public:
6477 explicit MiraiCPExceptionEvent(MiraiCPExceptionBase *err) {
6478 exceptionPtr = err;
6479 }
6480 public:
6481 static eventTypes::Types get_event_type() {
6482 return eventTypes::Types::MiraiCPExceptionEvent;
6483 }
6484 eventTypes::Types getEventType() const override { return this->get_event_type(); }
6485 const MiraiCPExceptionBase *getException() const {
6486 return exceptionPtr;
6487 }
6488 };
6490 class NodeHandle {
6491 private:
6492 bool _enable;
6493 public:
6494 explicit NodeHandle(bool a) : _enable(a) {}
6495 bool isEnable() const { return _enable; }
6496 void stop() { _enable = false; }
6497 void resume() { _enable = true; }
6498 };
6499 class MIRAICP_EXPORT Event {
6500 private: // typedefs
6501 class eventNode {
6502 private:
6504 std::shared_ptr<NodeHandle> _handle;
6505 public:
6506 std::function<bool(MiraiCPEvent *)> func;
6507 public:
6508 eventNode() : _handle(), func(nullptr) {}
6509 explicit eventNode(std::function<bool(MiraiCPEvent *)> f) : _handle(new NodeHandle(true)), func(std::move(f)) {}
6510 eventNode(const eventNode &_o) = default; // for MSVC compatible, or you will get an error
6511 eventNode(eventNode &&_o) noexcept : _handle(std::move(_o._handle)), func(std::move(_o.func)) {}
6512 public:
6514 bool run(MiraiCPEvent *a) const {
6515 return _handle->isEnable() && func(a);
6516 }
6517 std::shared_ptr<NodeHandle> getHandle() {
6518 return _handle;
6519 }
6520 };
6521 using priority_level = unsigned char;
6522 using event_vector = std::vector<eventNode>;
6523 using eventNodeTable = std::vector<std::map<priority_level, event_vector>>;
6524 private: // member
6525 eventNodeTable _all_events_;
6526 private:
6527 Event() : _all_events_(int(eventTypes::Types::count)){};
6528 public: // singleton mode
6529 static Event processor;
6530 private:
6531 template<typename EventClass>
6532 constexpr static int id() {
6533 static_assert(std::is_base_of_v<MiraiCPEvent, EventClass>, "只支持广播继承MiraiCPEvent的事件");
6534 return static_cast<int>(EventClass::get_event_type());
6535 }
6536 public:
6537 static bool noRegistered(int index) {
6538 return processor._all_events_[index].empty();
6539 }
6541 static void clear() noexcept {
6542 for (auto &a: processor._all_events_) a.clear();
6543 }
6544 static void incomingEvent(BaseEventData j, int type);
6546 template<typename EventClass>
6547 static void broadcast(EventClass &&val) {
6548 static_assert(std::is_base_of_v<MiraiCPEvent, EventClass>, "只支持广播MiraiCPEvent的派生类");
6549 MiraiCPEvent *p = &val;
6550 for (auto &&[k, v]: processor._all_events_[id<EventClass>()]) {
6551 for (auto &&a: v) {
6552 if (a.run(p)) return;
6553 }
6554 }
6555 }
6563 template<typename EventClass>
6564 static std::shared_ptr<NodeHandle> registerEvent(std::function<void(EventClass)> callback, priority_level level = 100) {
6565 static_assert(std::is_base_of_v<MiraiCPEvent, EventClass>, "只支持注册MiraiCPEvent的派生类事件");
6566 std::function<bool(MiraiCPEvent *)> tmp = [=](MiraiCPEvent *p) {
6567 callback(*static_cast<EventClass *>(p));
6568 return false;
6569 };
6570 auto t = eventNode(tmp);
6571 auto ans = t.getHandle();
6572 // 先获得shared_ptr才可以emplace_back
6573 processor._all_events_[id<EventClass>()][level].emplace_back(std::move(t));
6574 return ans;
6575 }
6584 template<typename EventClass>
6585 static std::shared_ptr<NodeHandle> registerBlockingEvent(std::function<bool(EventClass)> callback, priority_level level = 100) {
6586 static_assert(std::is_base_of_v<MiraiCPEvent, EventClass>, "只支持注册MiraiCPEvent的派生类事件");
6587 std::function<bool(MiraiCPEvent *)> tmp = [=](MiraiCPEvent *p) {
6588 return callback(*static_cast<EventClass *>(p));
6589 };
6590 auto t = eventNode(tmp);
6591 auto ans = t.getHandle();
6592 // 先获得shared_ptr才可以emplace_back
6593 processor._all_events_[id<EventClass>()][level].emplace_back(std::move(t));
6594 return ans;
6595 }
6596 };
6597} // namespace MiraiCP
6598#endif //MIRAICP_PRO_EVENT_H
6599// #include "Exception.h"
6600// #include "Logger.h"
6601// #include "PlatformThreading.h"
6602// Copyright (c) 2022. Eritque arcus and contributors.
6603//
6604// This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify
6605// it under the terms of the GNU Affero General Public License as
6606// published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the
6607// License, or any later version(in your opinion).
6608//
6609// This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
6610// but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
6611// MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the
6612// GNU Affero General Public License for more details.
6613//
6614// You should have received a copy of the GNU Affero General Public License
6615// along with this program. If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
6616//
6617#ifndef MIRAICP_PRO_PLATFORMTHREADING_H
6618#define MIRAICP_PRO_PLATFORMTHREADING_H
6619// #include "MiraiCPMacros.h"
6620// -----------------------
6621#if MIRAICP_MSVC
6622#include <Windows.h>
6623#include <processthreadsapi.h>
6624#include <string>
6625inline void *platform_thread_self() {
6626 return GetCurrentThread();
6627}
6628inline void platform_set_thread_name(void *platform_thread_self, const char *name) {
6629 size_t len = strlen(name);
6630 std::wstring wst(len + 1, '#');
6631 size_t num_convert;
6632 mbstowcs_s(&num_convert, &wst[0], len + 1, name, len + 1);
6633 SetThreadDescription(platform_thread_self, &wst[0]);
6634}
6635inline void platform_get_thread_name(void *platform_thread_self, char *buf, size_t bufsize) {
6636 wchar_t *wbuf;
6637 GetThreadDescription(platform_thread_self, &wbuf);
6638 size_t num_convert;
6639 wcstombs_s(&num_convert, buf, bufsize, wbuf, bufsize);
6640 LocalFree(wbuf);
6641}
6642#else
6643#include <thread>
6644inline auto platform_thread_self() {
6645 return pthread_self();
6646}
6647inline void platform_set_thread_name(decltype(platform_thread_self()) id, const char *name) {
6648 pthread_setname_np(id, name);
6649}
6650inline void platform_get_thread_name(decltype(platform_thread_self()) id, char *buf, size_t bufsize) {
6651 pthread_getname_np(id, buf, bufsize);
6652}
6653#endif
6654#endif //MIRAICP_PRO_PLATFORMTHREADING_H
6655#include <ostream>
6656#include <thread>
6657namespace MiraiCP {
6659 class MiraiCPNewThread : public std::thread {
6660 public:
6661 MiraiCPNewThread() noexcept = default;
6662 template<typename Callable, typename... Args>
6663 explicit MiraiCPNewThread(Callable &&func, Args &&...args)
6664 : std::thread(
6665 [lambda_func = std::forward<Callable>(func)](auto &&...argss) {
6666 try {
6667 const char *thread_name = CPPPlugin::config.id;
6668 platform_set_thread_name(platform_thread_self(), thread_name);
6669 lambda_func(std::forward<decltype(argss)>(argss)...);
6670 } catch (MiraiCPExceptionBase &e) {
6671 e.raise();
6672 Event::broadcast(MiraiCPExceptionEvent(&e));
6673 } catch (const std::exception &e) {
6674 MiraiCPThreadException exNew(std::string(e.what()), std::this_thread::get_id(), MIRAICP_EXCEPTION_WHERE);
6675 exNew.raise();
6676 Event::broadcast(MiraiCPExceptionEvent(&exNew));
6677 } catch (...) {
6678 MiraiCPThreadException exNew("unknown exception type", std::this_thread::get_id(), MIRAICP_EXCEPTION_WHERE);
6679 exNew.raise();
6680 Event::broadcast(MiraiCPExceptionEvent(&exNew));
6681 }
6682 },
6683 std::forward<Args>(args)...) {}
6684 MiraiCPNewThread &operator=(const std::thread &) = delete;
6685 MiraiCPNewThread &operator=(const MiraiCPNewThread &) = delete;
6686 MiraiCPNewThread &operator=(std::thread &&other) {
6687 static_cast<std::thread &>(*this) = std::move(other);
6688 return *this;
6689 }
6690 MiraiCPNewThread &operator=(MiraiCPNewThread &&other) noexcept {
6691 static_cast<std::thread &>(*this) = std::move(static_cast<std::thread &>(other));
6692 return *this;
6693 }
6694 };
6695} // namespace MiraiCP
6696#endif //MIRAICP_PRO_MIRAICPNEWTHREAD_H
6697#ifndef MIRAICP_PRO_MIRAICODE_H
6698#define MIRAICP_PRO_MIRAICODE_H
6699#include <string>
6700namespace MiraiCP {
6702 class MiraiCodeable {
6703 public:
6705 virtual std::string toMiraiCode() const = 0;
6706 virtual ~MiraiCodeable() = default;
6707 };
6711 class MiraiCode : public MiraiCodeable {
6712 private:
6713 std::string content;
6714 public:
6715 ~MiraiCode() override = default;
6717 std::string toString();
6719 std::string toMiraiCode() const override {
6720 return content;
6721 }
6723 MiraiCode(MiraiCodeable *a) { // NOLINT(google-explicit-constructor)
6724 content = a->toMiraiCode();
6725 }
6728 MiraiCode(const std::string &a, bool convert = false);
6729 MiraiCode operator+(MiraiCodeable *a) {
6730 return {content + a->toMiraiCode()};
6731 }
6732 MiraiCode operator+(const std::string &a) {
6733 return {content + a};
6734 }
6735 MiraiCode operator+(const MiraiCode &a) {
6736 return {content + a.content};
6737 }
6738 MiraiCode operator+(MiraiCode *a) {
6739 return {content + a->content};
6740 }
6741 MiraiCode &operator=(const std::string &a) {
6742 this->content = a;
6743 return *this;
6744 }
6745 MiraiCode plus(MiraiCodeable *a) {
6746 return {content + a->toMiraiCode()};
6747 }
6748 MiraiCode plus(const std::string &a) {
6749 return MiraiCode(a) + this;
6750 }
6752 static MiraiCode MiraiCodeWithoutEscape(const std::string &a) {
6753 return {a, false};
6754 }
6756 static MiraiCode MiraiCodeWithoutEscape(MiraiCodeable *a) {
6757 return {a->toMiraiCode(), false};
6758 }
6759 };
6760} // namespace MiraiCP
6761#endif //MIRAICP_PRO_MIRAICODE_H
6762//
6763// Created by antares on 11/10/22.
6764//
6765#ifndef MIRAICP_PRO_SCHEDULE_H
6766#define MIRAICP_PRO_SCHEDULE_H

6768#include <string>
6769namespace MiraiCP {
6776 void schedule(size_t sec, const std::string &msg);
6783 void schedule(std::chrono::seconds sec, const std::string &msg);
6784} // namespace MiraiCP
6785#endif //MIRAICP_PRO_SCHEDULE_H

6801#ifndef MIRAICP_PRO_SINGLEMESSAGE_H
6802#define MIRAICP_PRO_SINGLEMESSAGE_H
6803// #include "MiraiCPMacros.h"
6804// #include "MessageSource.h"
6805// #include "MiraiCode.h"
6806#include <array>
6807#include <json_fwd.hpp>
6808#include <optional>
6809#include <sstream>
6810#include <unordered_map>
6811#include <utility>
6812namespace MiraiCP {
6813 // todo(Antares): delete these after the whole refactor is finished
6814#define SINGLEMESSAGE_REFACTOR_ASSERTION(x, y) static_assert((x) == (y), "static assertion failed when refactoring code")
6815 namespace SingleMessageType {
6816 // id 小于 0 的是不能直接发送的消息(仅在接收的 MessageChain 里出现)
6817 MIRAICP_ITERABLE_ENUM( // NOLINT(cert-dcl21-cpp)
6818 -6, // begin at
6819 MessageSource_t, // -6
6820 MarketFace_t, // -5
6821 OnlineForwardedMessage_t, // -4
6822 OnlineAudio_t, // -3
6823 QuoteReply_t, // -2
6824 UnsupportedMessage_t, // -1
6825 PlainText_t, // 0
6826 At_t, // 1
6827 AtAll_t, // 2
6828 Image_t, // 3
6829 LightApp_t, // 4
6830 ServiceMessage_t, // 5
6831 RemoteFile_t, // 6
6832 Face_t, // 7
6833 FlashImage_t, // 8
6834 MusicShare_t // 9, End = 10
6835 )
6836 constexpr const char *miraiCodeNameInternal[] = {
6837 "NoExists", // 0
6838 "NoExists", // 1
6839 "NoExists", // 2
6840 "NoExists", // 3
6841 "NoExists", // 4
6842 "NoExists", // 5
6843 "NoExists", // 6
6844 "at", // 7
6845 "atall", // 8
6846 "image", // 9
6847 "app", // 10
6848 "service", // 11
6849 "file", // 12
6850 "face", // 13
6851 "flash", // 14
6852 "musicshare" // 15
6853 };
6854 constexpr const char *messageTypeInternal[] = {
6855 "MessageSource", // -6
6856 "MarketFace", // -5
6857 "ForwardMessage", // -4
6858 "OnlineAudio", // -3
6859 "QuoteReply", // -2
6860 "UnsupportedMessage", // -1
6861 "PlainText", // 0 <-- messageType is here
6862 "At", // 1
6863 "AtAll", // 2
6864 "Image", // 3
6865 "LightApp", // 4
6866 "SimpleServiceMessage", // 5
6867 "FileMessage", // 6
6868 "Face", // 7
6869 "FlashImage", // 8
6870 "MusicShare", // 9
6871 };
6872 static_assert(sizeof(messageTypeInternal) / sizeof(*messageTypeInternal) == SingleMessageType::End - SingleMessageType::Begin);
6873 } // namespace SingleMessageType
6875 struct URLSharer {
6877 std::string brief = "简介 没点进来看见的样子";
6879 std::string url = "目标url";
6881 std::string cover = "图标地址";
6883 std::string title = "标题";
6885 std::string summary = "描述文字";
6886 };
6888 class MIRAICP_EXPORT SingleMessage : public MiraiCodeable {
6889 public:
6890 public:
6891 using Types = SingleMessageType::Type;
6892 std::string content;
6893 std::string prefix;
6896 int internalType = SingleMessageType::UnsupportedMessage_t;
6897 protected:
6900 SingleMessage() = default; // NOLINT(cppcoreguidelines-pro-type-member-init)
6901 public:
6902 static const char *const *const messageType;
6903 static const char *const *const miraiCodeName;
6904 static std::string getTypeString(int type) {
6905 return messageType[type];
6906 }
6907 public:
6912 SingleMessage(int inType, std::string content, std::string prefix = ":") noexcept
6913 : content(std::move(content)),
6914 prefix(std::move(prefix)),
6915 internalType(inType) {}
6916 virtual ~SingleMessage() noexcept = default;
6917 public:
6921 static int getKey(const std::string &value);
6927 static int getMiraiCodeKey(const std::string &value);
6928 public:
6929 [[nodiscard]] virtual nlohmann::json toJson() const;
6930 [[nodiscard]] std::string toMiraiCode() const override;
6931 public:
6932 bool operator==(const SingleMessage &m) const {
6933 return this->internalType == m.internalType && this->toMiraiCode() == m.toMiraiCode();
6934 }
6935 bool operator==(SingleMessage *m) const {
6936 return this->internalType == m->internalType && this->toMiraiCode() == m->toMiraiCode();
6937 }
6938 };
6940 class MIRAICP_EXPORT PlainText : public SingleMessage {
6941 public:
6942 explicit PlainText(const SingleMessage &sg);
6943 PlainText(PlainText &&_o) noexcept = default;
6944 PlainText(const PlainText &_o) = default;
6945 explicit PlainText(std::string inStr) noexcept : SingleMessage(PlainText::type(), std::move(inStr)) {}
6946 template<typename Stringable, typename = decltype(std::to_string(std::declval<Stringable>()))>
6947 explicit PlainText(Stringable val) : SingleMessage(PlainText::type(), std::to_string(val)) {}
6948 public:
6949 static int type() {
6950 SINGLEMESSAGE_REFACTOR_ASSERTION(0, Types::PlainText_t);
6951 return Types::PlainText_t;
6952 }
6953 public:
6954 [[nodiscard]] std::string toMiraiCode() const override {
6955 return content;
6956 }
6957 [[nodiscard]] nlohmann::json toJson() const override;
6958 bool operator==(const PlainText &p) const {
6959 return this->content == p.content;
6960 }
6961 };
6962 // todo(Antares): 除特殊情况外（子类与基类没有差异）应禁止子类使用父类对象进行构造；或者构造函数直接调用downcast（不安全）
6963 // 例如 At(const SingleMessage &) 这样的构造函数不应该出现
6965 class MIRAICP_EXPORT At : public SingleMessage {
6966 public:
6967 static int type() {
6968 SINGLEMESSAGE_REFACTOR_ASSERTION(1, Types::At_t);
6969 return Types::At_t;
6970 }
6971 QQID target;
6972 [[nodiscard]] nlohmann::json toJson() const override;
6973 explicit At(const SingleMessage &sg);
6974 explicit At(QQID a) : SingleMessage(At::type(), std::to_string(a)), target(a) {};
6975 [[nodiscard]] std::string toMiraiCode() const override {
6976 return "[mirai:at:" + std::to_string(this->target) + "] "; // 后面有个空格
6977 }
6978 bool operator==(const At &a) const {
6979 return this->target == a.target;
6980 }
6981 };
6983 class MIRAICP_EXPORT AtAll : public SingleMessage {
6984 public:
6985 static int type() {
6986 SINGLEMESSAGE_REFACTOR_ASSERTION(2, Types::AtAll_t);
6987 return Types::AtAll_t;
6988 }
6989 [[nodiscard]] std::string toMiraiCode() const override {
6990 return "[mirai:atall] ";
6991 }
6992 [[nodiscard]] nlohmann::json toJson() const override;
6993 AtAll() : SingleMessage(AtAll::type(), "", "") {}
6994 };
6996 class MIRAICP_EXPORT Image : public SingleMessage {
6997 public:
6998 static int type() {
6999 SINGLEMESSAGE_REFACTOR_ASSERTION(3, Types::Image_t);
7000 return Types::Image_t;
7001 }
7002 //图片id，样式:` {xxx}.xx `
7003 std::string id;
7014 std::string imageType;
7016 std::optional<std::string> md5;
7018 std::optional<std::string> url;
7020 size_t size{};
7022 int width{};
7024 int height{};
7026 bool isEmoji{};
7034 bool isUploaded(QQID botid);
7035 protected:
7038 Image() = default; // NOLINT(cppcoreguidelines-pro-type-member-init)
7039 public:
7050 explicit Image(const std::string &imageId, size_t size = 0, int width = 0, int height = 0,
7051 std::string type = "PNG",
7052 bool isEmoji = false)
7053 : SingleMessage(Image::type(), imageId), id(imageId), imageType(std::move(type)), size(size),
7054 width(width), height(height), isEmoji(isEmoji) {
7055 // todo(Antares): 实际上重复的属性 id 和 content
7056 }
7058 void refreshInfo();
7060 [[nodiscard]] std::string toMiraiCode() const override {
7061 return "[mirai:image:" + this->id + "]";
7062 }
7063 [[nodiscard]] nlohmann::json toJson() const override;
7064 static Image deserialize(const std::string &);
7065 bool operator==(const Image &i) const {
7066 return this->id == i.id;
7067 }
7068 };
7070 class MIRAICP_EXPORT FlashImage : public Image {
7071 public:
7072 static int type() {
7073 SINGLEMESSAGE_REFACTOR_ASSERTION(8, Types::FlashImage_t);
7074 return Types::FlashImage_t;
7075 }
7076 [[nodiscard]] std::string toMiraiCode() const override {
7077 return "[mirai:flash:" + this->id + "]";
7078 }
7079 explicit FlashImage(const std::string &imageId, size_t size = 0, int width = 0, int height = 0,
7080 std::string type = "PNG") : Image(imageId, size, width, height, std::move(type)) {
7081 this->SingleMessage::internalType = Types::FlashImage_t;
7082 }
7083 explicit FlashImage(const Image &img);
7084 [[nodiscard]] nlohmann::json toJson() const override;
7085 static FlashImage deserialize(const std::string &);
7086 bool operator==(const FlashImage &i) const {
7087 return this->id == i.id;
7088 }
7090 Image toImage() { return Image(*this); }
7091 };
7097 class MIRAICP_EXPORT LightApp : public SingleMessage {

7101 return Types::LightApp_t;
7102 }
7105 explicit LightApp(std::string content) : SingleMessage(LightApp::type(), std::move(content)) {}
7106 explicit LightApp(const SingleMessage &sg);
7107 [[nodiscard]] nlohmann::json toJson() const override;
7109 [[nodiscard]] std::string toMiraiCode() const override;
7110 bool operator==(const LightApp &la) const {
7111 return this->content == la.content;
7112 }
7113 };
7116 class MIRAICP_EXPORT ServiceMessage : public SingleMessage {
7117 public:
7118 static int type() {
7119 SINGLEMESSAGE_REFACTOR_ASSERTION(5, Types::ServiceMessage_t);
7120 return Types::ServiceMessage_t;
7121 }
7122 [[nodiscard]] nlohmann::json toJson() const override;
7123 [[nodiscard]] std::string toMiraiCode() const override;
7124 int id;
7128 explicit ServiceMessage(int id, std::string a) : SingleMessage(ServiceMessage::type(), std::move(a),
7129 ":" + std::to_string(id) + ','),
7130 id(id) {}
7131 explicit ServiceMessage(const SingleMessage &sg);
7132 explicit ServiceMessage(const URLSharer &a) : SingleMessage(5,
7133 R"(<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><msg templateID="12345" action="web" brief=")" +
7134 a.brief + R"(" serviceID="1" url=")" + a.url +
7135 R"("><item layout="2"><picture cover=")" +
7136 a.cover + "\"/><title>" + a.title +
7137 "</title><summary>" + a.summary +
7138 "</summary></item><source/></msg>",
7139 ":1,"),
7140 id(1) {}
7141 bool operator==(const ServiceMessage &s) const {
7142 return this->content == s.content;
7143 }
7144 };
7146 class MIRAICP_EXPORT QuoteReply : public SingleMessage {
7147 public:
7148 static int type() {
7149 SINGLEMESSAGE_REFACTOR_ASSERTION(-2, Types::QuoteReply_t);
7150 return Types::QuoteReply_t;
7151 }
7152 // 不可直接发送, 发送引用信息用MessageChain.quoteAndSendMessage
7153 ShouldNotUse("don't have MiraiCode, use MessageChain.quote instead") std::string toMiraiCode() const override {
7154 return "";
7155 }
7157 MessageSource source;
7158 explicit QuoteReply(const SingleMessage &m);
7159 explicit QuoteReply(MessageSource source) : SingleMessage(QuoteReply::type(), source.serializeToString()), source(std::move(source)){};
7160 bool operator==(const QuoteReply &qr) const {
7161 return this->source == qr.source;
7162 }
7163 nlohmann::json toJson() const override;
7164 };
7166 class MIRAICP_EXPORT OnlineAudio : public SingleMessage {

7170 return Types::OnlineAudio_t;
7171 }
7173 std::string filename;
7175 std::string url;
7177 int size;
7179 int codec;
7181 int length;
7183 std::array<uint8_t, 16> md5;
7185 ShouldNotUse("cannot use, use Contact.sendAudio") std::string toMiraiCode() const override {
7186 return "";
7187 }
7188 explicit OnlineAudio(std::string f, std::array<uint8_t, 16> md5, int size, int codec, int length,
7189 std::string url) : SingleMessage(OnlineAudio::type(), ""),
7190 filename(std::move(f)), url(std::move(url)), size(size), codec(codec),
7191 length(length), md5(md5){};
7192 bool operator==(const OnlineAudio &oa) const {
7193 return this->md5 == oa.md5;
7194 }
7195 };
7197 class MIRAICP_EXPORT RemoteFile : public SingleMessage {
7198 public:
7199 static int type() {
7200 SINGLEMESSAGE_REFACTOR_ASSERTION(6, Types::RemoteFile_t);
7201 return Types::RemoteFile_t;
7202 }
7205 struct Dinfo {
7207 std::string url;
7209 std::string md5;
7211 std::string sha1;
7212 };
7215 struct Finfo {
7217 QQID size;
7219 QQID uploaderid;
7221 long expirytime;
7223 QQID uploadtime;
7225 QQID lastmodifytime;
7226 };
7228 std::string id;
7230 unsigned int internalid;
7232 std::string name;
7234 long long size;
7238 std::optional<std::string> path;
7242 std::optional<Dinfo> dinfo;
7246 std::optional<Finfo> finfo;
7247 std::string serializeToString();
7248 RemoteFile plus(unsigned int ii);
7249 static RemoteFile deserializeFromString(const std::string &source);
7260 explicit RemoteFile(const std::string &i, unsigned int ii, std::string n, long long s, std::string p, struct Dinfo d, struct Finfo f);
7271 explicit RemoteFile(const std::string &i, unsigned int ii, std::string n, long long s);
7273 ShouldNotUse("Cannot send manually, use Group.sendFile") std::string toMiraiCode() const override {
7274 return "";
7275 }
7276 bool operator==(const RemoteFile &rf) const {
7277 return this->id == rf.id;
7278 }
7279 };
7282 class MIRAICP_EXPORT Face : public SingleMessage {
7283 public:
7284 static int type() {
7285 SINGLEMESSAGE_REFACTOR_ASSERTION(7, Types::Face_t);
7286 return Types::Face_t;
7287 }
7291 int id;
7292 [[nodiscard]] nlohmann::json toJson() const override;
7293 [[nodiscard]] std::string toMiraiCode() const override {
7294 return "[mirai:face:" + std::to_string(id) + "]";
7295 }
7296 explicit Face(int id) : SingleMessage(Face::type(), std::to_string(id)), id(id) {}
7297 bool operator==(const Face &f) const {
7298 return this->id == f.id;
7299 }
7300 };
7302 class MIRAICP_EXPORT MusicShare : public SingleMessage {
7303 public:
7304 static int type() {
7305 SINGLEMESSAGE_REFACTOR_ASSERTION(9, Types::MusicShare_t);
7306 return Types::MusicShare_t;
7307 }
7309 std::string appName;
7311 std::string title;
7313 std::string summary;
7315 std::string jumpUrl;
7317 std::string picUrl;
7319 std::string musicUrl;
7321 std::string brief;
7322 [[nodiscard]] std::string toMiraiCode() const override {
7323 return "[mirai:musicshare:" + appName + "," + title + "," + summary + "," + jumpUrl + "," + picUrl + "," + musicUrl + "," + brief + "]";
7324 }
7325 MusicShare(std::string appName,
7326 std::string title,
7327 std::string summary,
7328 std::string jumpUrl,
7329 std::string picUrl,
7330 std::string musicUrl,
7331 std::string brief)
7332 : SingleMessage(MusicShare::type(), ""),
7333 appName(std::move(appName)),
7334 title(std::move(title)),
7335 summary(std::move(summary)),
7336 jumpUrl(std::move(jumpUrl)),
7337 picUrl(std::move(picUrl)),
7338 musicUrl(std::move(musicUrl)),
7339 brief(std::move(brief)) {}
7340 };
7341 class MIRAICP_EXPORT MarketFace : public SingleMessage {
7342 public:
7343 static int type() {
7344 SINGLEMESSAGE_REFACTOR_ASSERTION(-5, Types::MarketFace_t);
7345 return Types::MarketFace_t;
7346 }
7348 ShouldNotUse("暂不支持直接发送") std::string toMiraiCode() const override {
7349 return "";
7350 }
7351 std::array<uint8_t, 16> faceId;
7352 explicit MarketFace(std::array<uint8_t, 16> id) : SingleMessage(MarketFace::type(), ""), faceId(id) {}
7353 bool operator==(const MarketFace &mf) const {
7354 return this->faceId == mf.faceId;
7355 }
7356 };
7358 class MIRAICP_EXPORT UnSupportMessage : public SingleMessage {
7359 public:
7360 static int type() {
7361 SINGLEMESSAGE_REFACTOR_ASSERTION(-1, Types::UnsupportedMessage_t);
7362 return Types::UnsupportedMessage_t;
7363 }
7364 [[nodiscard]] nlohmann::json toJson() const override;
7366 ShouldNotUse("不支持直接发送UnSupportMessage") std::string toMiraiCode() const override {
7367 return "";
7368 }
7369 explicit UnSupportMessage(const SingleMessage &s) : SingleMessage(s){};
7370 explicit UnSupportMessage(const std::string &content) : SingleMessage(UnSupportMessage::type(), content) {}
7371 bool operator==(const UnSupportMessage &m) const {
7372 return this->content == m.content;
7373 }
7374 };
7375#undef SINGLEMESSAGE_REFACTOR_ASSERTION
7376} // namespace MiraiCP
7377#endif //MIRAICP_PRO_SINGLEMESSAGE_H
7378//
7379// Created by antares on 11/8/22.
7380//
7381#ifndef MIRAICP_PRO_THREADTASK_H
7382#define MIRAICP_PRO_THREADTASK_H
7383// #include "Logger.h"
7384// #include "loaderApiInternal.h"
7385#include <future>
7386namespace MiraiCP::ThreadTask {
7387 namespace internal {
7388 void task_interface(size_t id);
7389 size_t get_auto_incr_id();
7390 void remove_task(size_t id);
7391 void push_task(size_t id, std::shared_ptr<std::function<void()>> func);
7392 } // namespace internal
7397 template<typename F, typename... Args, typename R = std::invoke_result_t<std::decay_t<F>, std::decay_t<Args>...>>
7398 std::future<R> promiseTask(F &&func, Args &&...args) {
7399 auto promise = std::make_shared<std::promise<R>>();
7400 auto future = promise->get_future();
7401 std::function<R()> taskfunction = std::bind(std::forward<F>(func), std::forward<Args>(args)...);
7402 size_t function_id = internal::get_auto_incr_id();
7403 auto to_push_func = std::make_shared<std::function<void()>>(
7404 [promise = std::move(promise), function_id, taskfunction = std::move(taskfunction)]() {
7405 try {
7406 if constexpr (std::is_void_v<R>) {
7407 std::invoke(taskfunction);
7408 promise->set_value();
7409 } else {
7410 promise->set_value(std::invoke(taskfunction));
7411 }
7412 } catch (...) {
7413 try {
7414 promise->set_exception(std::current_exception());
7415 Logger::logger.error("Failed to run task: " + std::to_string(function_id));
7416 } catch (...) {
7417 }
7418 }
7419 try {
7420 internal::remove_task(function_id);
7421 } catch (...) {
7422 }
7423 });
7424 internal::push_task(function_id, std::move(to_push_func));
7425 return future;
7426 }
7430 template<typename F, typename... Args, typename R = std::invoke_result_t<std::decay_t<F>, std::decay_t<Args>...>>
7431 void addTask(F &&func, Args &&...args) {
7432 if constexpr (std::is_same_v<std::decay_t<F>, void (*)()>) {
7433 LibLoader::LoaderApi::pushTask(func);
7434 } else {
7435 auto function_id = internal::get_auto_incr_id();
7436 std::function<void()> taskfunction = std::bind(std::forward<F>(func), std::forward<Args>(args)...);
7437 auto to_push_func = std::make_shared<std::function<void()>>(
7438 [function_id, taskfunction = std::move(taskfunction)]() {
7439 try {
7440 std::invoke(taskfunction);
7441 } catch (...) {
7442 try {
7443 Logger::logger.error("Failed to run task: " + std::to_string(function_id));
7444 } catch (...) {
7445 }
7446 }
7447 try {
7448 internal::remove_task(function_id);
7449 } catch (...) {
7450 }
7451 });
7452 internal::push_task(function_id, std::move(to_push_func));
7453 }
7454 }
7455}; // namespace MiraiCP::ThreadTask
7456#endif //MIRAICP_PRO_THREADTASK_H
7457#ifndef MIRAICP_PRO_TOOLS_H
7458#define MIRAICP_PRO_TOOLS_H
7459// #include "MiraiCPMacros.h"
7460// -----------------------
7461// #include "commonTypes.h"
7462#include <sstream>
7463#include <string>
7464#include <vector>
7465namespace MiraiCP {
7467 namespace Tools {
7476 MIRAICP_EXPORT std::string replace(std::string str, std::string_view from, std::string_view to);
7481 template<typename T>
7482 inline std::string VectorToString(const std::vector<T> &a, const std::string &separator = ",") {
7483 std::stringstream ss;
7484 for (auto it = a.begin(); it != a.end(); ++it) {
7485 if (it != a.begin()) ss << separator;
7486 ss << *it;
7487 }
7488 return ss.str();
7489 }
7493 template<>
7494 inline std::string VectorToString(const std::vector<QQID> &a, const std::string &separator) {
7495 std::string ss;
7496 for (auto it = a.begin(); it != a.end(); ++it) {
7497 if (it != a.begin()) ss += separator;
7498 ss += std::to_string(*it);
7499 }
7500 return ss;
7501 }
7505 template<>
7506 inline std::string VectorToString(const std::vector<std::string> &a, const std::string &separator) {
7507 std::string ans;
7508 for (auto it = a.begin(); it != a.end(); ++it) {
7509 if (it != a.begin()) ans += separator;
7510 ans += *it;
7511 }
7512 return ans;
7513 }
7517 MIRAICP_EXPORT std::vector<QQID> StringToVector(std::string temp);
7521 MIRAICP_EXPORT std::string escapeFromMiraiCode(const std::string &s);
7523 MIRAICP_EXPORT std::string escapeToMiraiCode(const std::string &s);
7525 MIRAICP_EXPORT bool starts_with(std::string_view f, std::string_view s);
7527 MIRAICP_EXPORT bool icompareChar(const char &c1, const char &c2);
7529 MIRAICP_EXPORT bool iequal(std::string_view str1, std::string_view str2);
7531 MIRAICP_EXPORT std::vector<std::string> split(const std::string &text, const std::string &delim);
7533 template<typename T>
7534 inline T json_mover(nlohmann::json &j, const std::string &key) {
7535 return std::move(j[key].get_ref<T &>());
7536 }
7538 template<>
7539 inline nlohmann::json json_mover(nlohmann::json &j, const std::string &key) {
7540 return std::move(j[key]);
7541 }
7542 inline std::string json_stringmover(nlohmann::json &j, const std::string &key) {
7543 return json_mover<std::string>(j, key);
7544 }
7545 inline nlohmann::json json_jsonmover(nlohmann::json &j, const std::string &key) {
7546 return json_mover<nlohmann::json>(j, key);
7547 }
7550 struct idpair {
7551 QQID id1;
7552 QQID id2;
7553 bool operator==(const idpair &other) const {
7554 return id1 == other.id1 && id2 == other.id2;
7555 }
7556 };
7557 }; // namespace Tools
7558} // namespace MiraiCP
7560template<>
7561struct std::hash<MiraiCP::Tools::idpair> {
7562 using idpair = MiraiCP::Tools::idpair;
7563 size_t operator()(const idpair in_pair) const {
7564 auto First = reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&in_pair);
7565 size_t Val = 14695981039346656037ULL; // see: type_traits.h (MSVC)
7566 for (size_t Idx = 0; Idx < sizeof(idpair); ++Idx) {
7567 Val ^= static_cast<size_t>(First[Idx]);
7568 Val *= 1099511628211ULL; // see: type_traits.h (MSVC)
7569 }
7570 return Val;
7571 }
7572};
7573#endif //MIRAICP_PRO_TOOLS_H

7625namespace MiraiCP {
7627 void enrollPlugin();
7629 [[deprecated("use enrollPlugin<T> instead")]] inline void enrollPlugin(CPPPlugin *p) {
7630 CPPPlugin::plugin.reset(p);
7631 }
7633 template<typename T>
7634 inline void enrollPlugin() {
7635 static_assert(std::is_base_of_v<CPPPlugin, T>, "Enrolling plugin type T should be inherited from CPPPlugin");
7636 CPPPlugin::plugin = std::make_unique<T>();
7637 }
7638} // namespace MiraiCP
